Perezida Samia Suluhu Hassan yanenze imyifatire y’Abadepite mu nteko ishinga amategeko aho abo mu ishyaka CCM riri ku butegetsi bari kugera no gufatana mu mashati avuga ko bibabaje ndetse ko ntacyo biri gufasha igihugu.
Izi mpaka za ngo turwane ziri mu nteko ishinga amategeko zishingiye ahanini ku kugereranya Magufuli wahoze ari perezida na Samia wamusimbuye, bamwe bagashima uwapfuye abandi bagakeza uwimye.
Ikinyamakuru the Citizen cyanditse ko perezida Samia yasabye aba Badepite kutirirwa bapfa
... 
ngo y’imari aho gushwana bapfa ibyo umwe yemera undi atemera.
Madame Samia Suluhu Hassan yavuze ko kuba bamwe babona ko Magufuli ntacyo yamariye abanya-Tanzania bidakwiye gufata umwanya mu nteko kuko atariko kazi k’abashinga amategeko.
Ku rundi ruhande mu nteko rusange ya Loni umunyamabanga mukuru wayo bwana Antonio Guteress n’abandi bategetsi bashimiye ibyakozwe na nyakwigendera Magufuli bavuga ko hari byinshi Isi ikwiye ku mwigiraho.

...
u avuga ko bidakwiriye abaturage bashaka iterambere.
Uyu munyedini yavuze ko abari kwitwikira imbuga nkoranyambaga bagashimagiza Suluhu Hassan bishakira indonke, bamwe bagashaka imyanya mu butegetsi ,ariko abibutsa ko bahakwa ukundi badashebeje nyakwigendera Magufuli kuko yakoze ibye mu gihe cye.
Ubundi impaka mu nteko ishingamategeko ya Tanzania zakundaga kuba hagati y’Abadepite ba CCM n’abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi.
Kuri ubu hararwana aba CCM bamwe ngo bagamije kwihakirwa kuri perezida mushya.

Umukuru w'ishirahamwe OLUCOME rigwanya ibiturire n’isesagurwa ry’amatungo ya reta Gabriel Rufyiri, yitavye umutahe w'umushikirizamanza wa repuburika mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, ku wa gatatu igenekerezo rya mirongo ibiri, ukwezi kwa kane. ... 
iyo, mu ndwi irangiye. Uwuburanira Gabriel Rufyiri yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko bagiye kwegeranya ivyo basabwe kugira ngo bazobishikirize kw'isango ata tomoye.
Mu ndwi irangiye, Gabriel Rufyiri yatangaje ku maradiyo yigenga, ko afise inkuru zivuga ko bamwe mu batwara umugambwe CNDD-FDD bariko barategura umugambi wo kugandagura abantu mirongo ine, bitwa ko babangamira ubutegetsi bwa CNDD-FDD. Umukuru wa OLUCOME avuga ko abo bantu ari abanyeporitike batavuga rumwe na reta, bamwe bakaba ari abatwar
...
COME, ariko ugasaba ko ubutungane bwokurikirana Gabriel Rufyiri, kugira ngo ukuri kumenyekane. Imigenderanire hagati y'ishirahamwe OLUCOME na reta yagiye iratituka kubera amadosiye y’abanyonora amatungo ya reta OLUCOME yagiye irashira ahabona.
Imyaka ibiri iraheze icegera c'umukuru w’ishirahamwe OLUCOME, Ernest Manirumva agandaguwe,umukuru wa OLUCOME Gabriel Rufyiri akavuga ko yagandaguwe n'ubutegetsi. Amatohoza yagiye arakorwa yerekanye ko hariho bamwe mu baporisi bagize uruhara mur'urwo rupfu.

Umuyobozi mukuru wa BMBC amenyeshako igituma yishikira kuma chantiers yaba ayagitangura kwubakwa canke ayo ibikorwa bigeze kure, ari mu ntumbero yo kuraba ko ivyasabwe n’abakiriya mu masezerano arivyo biriko birakwirikizwa.
Mu kiganiro yagiraniye n’abakora mu gisata co kumenyesha amakuru ca BMBC yavuzeko mu bikorwa bijanye no kubaka umuyobozi abwirizwa kwishikira k’urubuga kugira asuzume ko biriko bigenda neza.
Uwo muyobozi yavuze ati : «Umuyobozi adashika k’urubuga aba ariko ayobora ibintu nabi».
Umuyobozi mukuru wa BMBC yariko yereka abafundi uko inyubako igiye kubakwa
Umuyobozi wa BMBC avuga kandi ko Kugira abantu bubake neza ari mu gihe aba afise abariko bamukwirikirana.
Yavuze ati : « Mw’isuzuma ngira ryo kwishikira k’urubuga ndasuzuma ko ibikorwa bigenda bijana n’uburyo bwateguwe mu vyigwa. »
Uwo muyobozi aheraheza avuga ko kwubaka bidasanzwe kuko atari gusesagura canke kuja munsi y’ivyategekanijwe kwishikira k’urubuga bifasha gukinga amakosa.

Igihuhusi Molave kiriko gica muri Vietnam kimaze guhitana n'imuburiburi abantu 35. Abarenga 50 baburiwe irengero. Ibitangazamakuru vya Reta muri ico gihugu bivuga ko abantu barenga umuliyoni n’amajana indwi nabo bari mu kizime catewe n’umuyaga nkuba wacitse mu bice bitandukanye.
Abategetsi muri Vietnam bemeza ko iki gihuhusi ciswe Molave ari co ca mbere mu bukari cibasiye ico gihugu co ku mugabane wa Aziya. Kije gisongera isibe y’ingaruka y’imvura yaguye mu minsi iheze igahitana abantu 160.
Abasirikare b’ico gihugu bari mu bariko baratabara, bongera barondera aboba basenyukiweko n’ibihomeke birimwo imisozi. Igihuhusi Molave gifise umuvuduko w’ibirometero 150 kw’isaha. Hagati aho, Reta igabisha ko Ibitigri vy’abo cahitanye bishobora kwiyongera kuko ibice bimwe bimwe bitariko birashobora gutanga amakuru y’ivyononekaye. Abamaze kwegeranirizwa hamwe barenga ibihumbi 40, amashure yose yugawe mu ntumbero yo gukinga .

Umutoza Johnny McKinstry nyuma yo kurangiza amasezerano y’umwaka umwe yasinye indi myaka ibiri aho amasezerano azarangira muri 2018.
Johnny McKinstry yaje muri Werurwe umwaka ushize wa 2015 aho yaje asimbura umutoza Stephane Constantine werekeje mu Buhinde ashyira umukono ku masezerano tariki ya 17 Werurwe 2015.
McKinstry mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru cyabaye kuwa Gatatu tariki ya 22 Werurwe 2016 yavuze ko yongereye amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri akaba azarangira mu mwaka wa 2018.

Mu mwaka wa 2016 u Rwanda rwakiriye irushanwa rya CHAN Amavubi yageze muri ¼ aho rwasezerewe na Congo Kinshasa.
Kugeza ubu McKinstry yongereye amasezerano aho agiye kujyana Amavubi mu Birwa bya Maurice aho bagiye gukina umukino ubanza tariki ya 26 Werurwe uyu mwaka umukino wo kwishyura uzabera i Kigali tariki 29 Werurwe uyu mwaka.

Kur’uyu wa gatanu, intureka zadutse k’umugwa mukuru wa Republika Iharanira Demokrasi ya Kongo, I Kinshasa, ku nyubakwa y’umwe mu barongozi ba politike, aho abapolisi bariko baragerageza gufata abari mur’iyo nyubakwa. Ne Muanda Nsemi asanzwe ar’umushingamateka, be n’umutambukanyi wiwe bahavuye basohoka kwishikana imbere y’abapolisi.
Haraheze indwi zibiri abapolisi bagerageza kwinjira mur’iyo nyubakwa mu ntumbero yo kuyisaka, yamara abanyagihugu bari muriyo, bagizwe n’abagabo abagore n’abana bari bararahiye bararengwa kw’ata mupolisi ahinjira. Iyo nyubakwa isanzwe irangurigwamwo imigigwa y’idini ryitwa Bundu dia Kongo. Ne Muanda Nsemi, asanzwe ar’umunywanyi w’iryo dini, aregwa ko yakokeje abanyagihugu, aciye ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, kugarariza ubutegetsi bwa Prezida Joseph Kabila.
Abanyagihugu baba mu micungararo yo m’uburaruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Kinshasa, bavuga ko abapolisi barashe akatari gake kur’iyo nyubakwa. Colonel Mwanamputu, yararongoye abapolisi mur’ico gikorwa yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko n’ubwo hari uguhangana, ico gikorwa kibandanya gushika binjiye mur’iyo nzu. Akavuga ko gishobora guhera k’umugoroba wo kur’uyu wa gatandatu.

Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu yatangaje ko umuntu umwe yitabye Imana mu gihe abandi 37 bakomerekeye mu muvundo wavutse ku muryango wasohokeragamo abitabiriye ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza by’Umuryango FPR-Inkotanyi i Rubavu kuri iki Cyumweru.
Kuri iki Cyumweru, tariki ya 23 Kamena 2024, ni bwo Umukandida wa FPR Inkotanyi, Paul Kagame, yakomereje i Rubavu ibikorwa byo kwiyamamariza kuyobora u Rwanda mu myaka itanu iri imbere mu matora ateganyijwe ku wa 14-16 Nyakanga 2024.

u matora ya Perezida wa Repubulika n’ay’Abadepite.
Kuri uyu munsi kandi FPR Inkotanyi yatangije ibikorwa byo kwamamaza abakandida ku mwanya w’Ubudepite.
Ni abakandida 80 barimo abo muri uyu Muryango n’indi mitwe ya politiki byafatanyije irimo PDC, PPC, PSR, PSP na UDPR.
Kuri uyu wa mbere, FPR Inkotanyi izakomeza ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza ku wa Mbere, tariki ya 24 Kamena 2024, aho izageza imigabo n’imigambi byayo ku batuye mu Karere ka Ngororero mu Ntara y’Iburengerazuba na Muhanga mu y’Amajyepfo.

Ikipe ya Rayon Sports yongeye kwihaniza APR FC iyitsinda ubugira kabiri ihita inayitwara igikombe cy’Amahoro, ku mukino wa nyuma wahuje aya makipe y’amakeba kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 4 Nyakanga 2016
Nyuma y’uko mu minsi ishize Rayon Sports yaherukaga gutsinda APR FC mu mikino ya shampiyona ibitego 4 byose ku busa, yongeye kuyisubira ku mukino wa nyuma w’igikombe cy’amahoro.
Nyuma yo guhangana kw’amakipe yombi kugeza mu minota ya nyuma y’umukino, ikipe ya Rayon Sports yabonye igitego cyayo ndetse umukino uhita urangira ari 1-0, APR FC yongera gutahana umugayo imbere y’umukeba.
Igikombe cy’amahoro Rayon Sports yamaze kwibikaho, gishobora kuba igikombe rukumbi yegukanye muri uyu mwaka kuko APR FC bigaragara ko ari yo ifite amahirwe menshi yo kwegukana igikombe cya shampiyona.

Igisirikare cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kiratangaza ko ibitero by’indege byagabwe ku barwanyi b’umutwe wiyita Leta ya Kisilamu (IS) muri Libye byahitanye abarwanyi basaga 80 b’uyu mutwe uvuga ko ugendera ku mahame akarishye ya Kisilamu.
Ni mu bitero byagabwe nyuma y’inkunga y’ibisasu 100 byatanzwe ku mabwiriza ya Perezida Barack Obama washyize umukono ku mwanzuro wo gutanga ibi bisasu kuwa Gatatu mbere y’uko ava muri White House.
Umunyamabanga w’igisirikare cya US, Ash Carter wemeje aya makuru, avuga ko mu bitero byagabwe muri Libye byahitanye abarwanyi basaga 80 bo mu mutwe wiyita Leta ya Kisilamu (IS).
Ati “ Ibi bitero byari bigamije kuburizamo ibitero byategurwaga kugabwa ku mugabane w’Uburayi.”
Avuga ko ibi bitero bya US bigamije kugaragaza ubushake bwo kurimbura umutwe wiyita Leta ya Kisilamu.
Ati “ Ibi byakozwe mu rwego rw’ubukangurambaga no gutanga urugero rwize rw’umuhate dufite mu gusenya ‘Leta ya Kisilamu’ atari muri Iraq no muri Syria gusa ahubwo n’ahandi hose uyu mutwe washinze ibirindiro.”
Iki gitero cya US cyanakuye mu birindiro abarwanyi ba IS bari barashinze ibirindiro mu mujyi wa Sirte, bagana mu bilimetero 45 uvuye muri uyu mujyi. Muri ibi bitero, hatewe ibisasu bibiri byo mu bwoko bwa B-2 mu mujyi wa Missouri.
Tumwe mu duce two mu gihugu cya Libya twabaye indiri y’imitwe y’iterabwoba nyuma y’urupfu rwa Gaddafi uwahoze ayobora iki gihugu rwakurikiwe no gucikamo ibice kw’igisirikare cya Libye.

Amatora y’umukuru w’igihugu muri Uganda yatangiye kuva saa moya ku isaha yaho, imirongo miremire y’abatora yabonetse mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu, barahitamo umukandida umwe mu 10 bahatanira uwo mwanya.
Amatora ari kuba mu gihugu kitarimo ‘internet’ ndetse n’imbuga nkoranyambaga zikaba zarahagaritswe.
Hamwe na hamwe havuzwe gukerererwa kw’ibikoresho by’amatora biba ngombwa ko abatora bategereza, nk’uko BBC yabitangaje.
Bobi Wine wo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi aratorera hafi y’aho atuye ahitwa Magere mu karere ka Wakiso muri Kampala.
Perezida Yoweri Museveni we aratorera mu gice cy’icyaro iwabo aho afite urugo mu burengerazuba bw’igihugu.
Hari ingorane zitandukanye mu gutanga no kubona amakuru mu gihe internet n’imbuga nkoranyambaga byavanyweho mu gihugu.
Ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza byabayemo urugomo ndetse hapfuye abantu babarirwa muri mirongo, biganjemo abo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi.
Perezida Museveni arashaka manda ya gatandatu nyuma y’imyaka hafi 35 amaze ku butegetsi.
Ibyavuye muri aya matora by’ibanze biratangazwa nyuma y’amasaha 48 nk’uko bivugwa na komisiyo ishinzwe amatora.

Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa wa Afurika y’Epfo yanenze ibihugu bya Afurika gukora “nk’abari abakoroni bacu” bifunga ingendo kuri icyo gihugu kubera ubwoko bwa Covid-19 bwitwa Omicron.
Ibihugu bine bya Afurika biirmo Mauritius, Seychelles Misiri n’u Rwanda byiyongereye ku bihugu birimo iby’Iburayi na Amerika bifunga ingendo ziva n’izijya mu bihugu by’Afurika y’amajyepfo.
Perezida Ramaphosa yavuze ibi kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 30 Ugushyingo 2021, ubwo yatangiraga urugendo rwe muri Afurika y’iburengera
... 
ti “Mu cyubahiro mbigomba, bifite impamvu zabyo ariko twifuza kugirana ibiganiro nabyo. Twifuza ko bitagakoze nk’abahoze ari abakoroni bacu bihutiye gufunga Afurika.”
Ibihugu, cyane cyane bikize, byafashe ziriya ngamba ku mpamvu zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’ubwoko bushya bwa Covid-19 bwatangajwe n’ishami ry’umurynago w’abibumbye ryita ku buzima OMS nk’ubuteye impungenge.

...

Ibihugu bya Arabia Saoudite na Brazil nabyo byatangaje ko byabonye abantu ba mbere banduye Omicron.
Naho ikigo Danish Patient Safety Authority cya Denmark cyatangaje ko cyabonye umuntu wanduye Omicron wari mu gitaramo cyitabiriwe n’abantu barenga 1,600 kuwa gatandatu tariki 27 Ugushyingo 2021, mu majyaruguru y’iki gihugu.
Denmark yari isanzwe yaremeje abantu bane banduye Omicron, bose bari baraje bavuye muri Afurika y’Epfo.

ngajwe iki kibuga cyanengwaga ngo kibe cyakosorwa. Icyaje kuba, ni uko ku mukino w’umunsi wa 10 wa shampiyona, Pépinière yaje gutegerereza AS Kigali ku Ruyenzi ntiyayibona, mu gihe abanyamujyi na Ferwafa bari ku Kicukiro birangira banayiteye mpaga.

Rukuruzi mu Rukundo hagati ya Eminem na Nick Minaji
Umuhanzikazi Nick Minaji ubwo yandikaga kuruba rwe rwa Twitter avuga ko ari mu rukundo na Eminem, ubu Eminem nawe yatangaje ko agiye gukundana na Nick Minaji bidasubirwaho.
Nkuko byatangajwe na Nick Minaji kurukuta rwe rwa Twitter, rukuruzi ikomeje kurangwa muri bose hagati ye na Eminem wanabitangarije abafana ko agiye gukundana na Nick Minaji mu ruhame.
Kugeza ubu amagambo yatangiye gukwirakwiza hirya no hino ku Isi mu bakunzi b’uruganda rw’umuziki ko Nyuma yuko Nick Minaji atandukanye n’uwahoze ari umugabo Mike Mille ko ubu yaba agiye gukundana n’umuraperi Eminem.
Ubwo Nick Minaji yabishyiraga kuri Twitter ye nyuma yaje gusobanura ko yikiniraga, ariko uko kwikinira byatumye Eminem ahita abifata nkukuri none we yahise atangaza ko agiye kumukunda.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 45 y’amavuko, mu kutazuyaza kwe yahise abishyira muruhame ubwo yari yagiye gutaramira abakunzi be I Boston, maze ahita abivugira ku rubyiniro abibwira abafana be agira ati: “Ni bande hano bifuza ko natereta Nicki Minaj?,ariko mutegereza gato kugira ngo mbigire impamo.Ndashaka ko tubirangiza gusa nanjye ndabishaka.”

Ikipe zihagarariye U Rwanda zagowe n’umunsi wa mbere muri Shampiyona ya Afurika mu mukino w’amagare
Ku munsi wa mbere muri iyi shampiyona ya Afurika mu mukino wo gusiganwa ku magare nta kipe n’imwe ituruka mu Rwanda yabashije kwegukana igihembo na kimwe.
Ku munsi w’ejo kuwa Gatatu taliki ya 23 Werurwe 2022 I Sharm El Sheik mu gihugu cya Misiri nibwo hatangiye shampiyona ya Afurika mu magare aho yaje kuba yitabirwa n’abakinnyi b’Abanyarwanda batandukanye haba mu bagabo ndetse n’abagore.
Ku munsi wa mbere hakinnye buri kipe Isiganwa ku giti cyayo (Team Time Trial)aho amakipe yombi haba mu bagabo ndetse n’abagore amakipe yombi yaje ku mwanya wa kane bituma U Rwanda nta gihembo na kimwe rwegukana.
Mu bagabo ikipe y’U Rwanda yaje ku mwanya wa kane inyuma ya Eritrea yaje ku mwanya wa mbere, Afurika y’epfo yaje ku mwanya wa kabiri naho Algeriya iza ku mwanya wa gatatu.
Mu bagore naho U Rwanda rwaje ku mwanya wa kane inyuma ya Eritrea, Mauritius na Misiri yaje ku mwanya wa gatatu.
Kuri uyu munsi iri rushanwa rigomba gukomeza aho barakina umuntu ku giti cye (Individual Time Trial) ku ngimbi n’abangavu hamwe n’abakuru muri rusange.

Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryita ku burenganzira bwa kiremwa muntu, Human Rights Watch risaba ko hakorwa amatohoza ku kibanza kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero bwa Siriya ahoba haratawe ibiziga vy’abantu ibihumbi mu kiringo giharurwa mu myaka.
Human Rights Watch ryabishikirije muri raporo ryasohoye kuri uyu wa mbere ko ico kibanza kiri hagati mu misozi y’ahitwa al-Hota, kiri ku bilometero 85 mu buraruko bw’igisagara ca Raqqa.
Iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko abarwanyi b’umuhari w’iterabwoba wa reta ya kiyisilamu wagenzuye ako karere hagati y’imyaka ya 2013 na 2015. Rivuga kandi ko muri Siriya hose, hari ibinogo rusangi birenga 20 vyahambwemwo ibiziga vy’abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi.

Venus Williams: Impanuka y'imodoka "yateje" yishe umugabo w'imyaka 78
Umukinyi akomeye wa Tennis wo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Venus Williams yagize impanuka y'imodoka yahitanye umugabo ashaje w'imyaka 78.
Umuvugizi w'igipolisi ca Palm Beach Gardens co mu ntara ya Florida, yabwiye BBC ko bari mw'itohoza ry'impanuka yahitanye umuntu, irimwo uwo mukinyi amaze gutsinda incuro nyinshi ihiganwa Grand Slam.
Muri iyo mpanuka yabaye itariki 9 z'ukwezi kwa gatandatu, umugabo yayikomerekeyemwo yatw
... 
 zasekana mu masanganzira.
Imodoka ya Madamu Williams yarabazibiye ntiyava muri ayo masanganzira kare, kubera urugwirirane rw'imodoka, nkuko ivyabona vyasiguye mu gipolisi.
Madamu Barson nawe nyene yarajanywe mu bitaro, ariko we aracariho.
"Madamu Williams ari mu makosa mu kuba atahaye inzira uwuzananye mu buryo bw'uwo wundi mushoferi," niko icegeranyo kivuga, kikongera ko ata catowe gishingiye ku biyayuramutwe, inzoga canke ugusamazwa na telefone ngendanwa.
Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 37 yatsinze incu
...
a yagenda ku murindi wa 5mph (8kmh), igihe imodoka yagendeshwa na Madamu Barson yamwinjiramwo.
"Ubutegetsi nta caha kijanye n'ukugendesha imodoka bwegetse kuri Madamu Williams. Ino ni impanuka ibabaje kandi Venus arifadikanije n'umuryango wabuze uwo wakunda."
Mu ndwi iza, Madamu Williams ategekanya kuja mu rukino rwiwe rwa 20 mw'ihiganwa rya Wimbledon i Londres, aho ari mu kibanza ca 10.
Madamu Williams n'uwo bavukana Serena, nibo bifatiye mu minwe urukino rwa tennis mu bagore muri ino myaka 20.

Ikigo cya Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika Gishinzwe ibiribwa n’imiti, US FDA, cyemeje bidasubirwaho urukingo rwakozwe na Pfizer Inc. na BioNTech SE mu gukingira COVID-19 abantu...
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko igiye gutangira icyiciro cya gatatu cyo gukingira COVID-19 abantu benshi, kuri iyi nshuro hakazibandwa ku bantu bose barengeje imyaka 18 y’amavuko, haherewe...
Icyizere kimaze kuba cyinshi ku banyarwanda bamaze igihe gisaga umwaka n’igice mu bihe by’icyorezo cya COVID-19, kidafite umuti, ahubwo amaso ahanzwe inkingo nazo zitakunze kuboneka uko...
Kaminuza mpuzamahanga yigisha ubumenyi mu by’ubuzima, UGHE (University of Global Health Equity), igiye gushyikiriza impamyabumenyi abanyeshuri 23 barangije icyiciro cya gatatu cya kaminuza, mu bijyanye n’imitangire...
Ronapreve ni umuti wakozwe n’inganda zo mu Bwongereza ukaba ufite ubushobozi bwo kurinda ko umuntu yandura COVID-19 ariko ukanamuvura ibisigisigi byayo ku bayanduye. Ni umuti ukomatanyije...

Prezida Paul KAGAME w’U Rwanda yayoboye inama idasanzwe y’I bihugu byo muri Afrika y’Iburasirazuba EAC, inama ititabiriwe na Tanzaniya n’Uburundi
Nyuma y’aho inama y’abakuru b’Ibihugu byo mu karere ka Afrika y’iburasirazuba itabaye hagati mu kwezi gushize kwa kane, iyo nama yabashije kuba uyu munsi iyoborwa na Nyakubahwa Prezida wa Repubulika y’U Rwanda KAGAME PAUL akaba ariwe nawe uyoboye uno muryango muri uno mwaka. Muri iyo nama ititabiriwe n’abakuru b’Ibihugu bibiri byo muri uwo muryango ari
... 
ezo cya Coronavirus.
Ni inama yayobowe na Prezida Kagame yitabirwa n’abakuru b’Ibihugu bane muri batandatu bagize uwo muryango
Iyo nama yari igamije kurebera hamwe aho ingamba z’ishyirwa mu bikorwa imyanzuro yo gukumira icyorezo cya Covid-19 igeze. Kugeza ubu muri kano karere, abarwayi ba coronavirus ni 1700, ibihugu nka Tanzaniya n’Uburundi byagiye bishinjwa gushyira imbaraga nke mu bwirinzi bw’icyo cyorezo, mu gihugu cy’u Burundi bo imyiteguro y’amatora irakomeje aho abakandida bakomeje kwiyam

we mu bihugu gifite abantu benshi banduye covid-19 muri kano karere
Muri runo rugamba rwo kurwanya Coronavirus, ibihugu byo mu Karere ka EAC ntabwo byagiye bishyira hamwe mu guhuza imbaraga, ku buryo ibihugu bya Tanzaniya n’Uburundi byakomeje ubuzima busanzwe bakavuga ko Imana izabarinda, ikintu benshi mu bakurikiranira hafi politiki yaka Karere basanga atacyo Imbaraga z’igihugu kimwe zishobora gutanga mu kurwanya kino cyorezo mu gihe ibindi bikigira ntibindeba.
Gutanga ibitekerezo byahagariswe.

Rutahizamu ukomoka mu gihugu cy’Ubwongereza Jack Grealish, usanzwe akinira ikipe ya Aston Villa muri Premier league ndetse akaba anayibereye Kapiteni, yongereye amasezerano y’imyaka itanu muri iyi kipe azamugeza mu mwaka wa 2025.
Uyu mukinnyi w’imyaka 24 y’amavuko, yafashije cyane ikipe ya Aston villa kuguma mu cyiciro cya mbere, aho yayitsindiye ibitego bigera Ku munani mu mikino 36 yakinnye mu mwaka ushize w’imikino wa 2019-2020, byatumye atangira kwifuzwa n’amakipe akomeye arimo ikipe ya Manchester united ndetse na Arsenal.
Uyu mugabo akaba yatangaje ko yishimiye cyane kongera amasezerano muri iyi kipe asanzwe abereye Kapiteni, aho yagize ati”iyi n’ikipe yanjye, hano ni mu rugo, niyo mpamvu nahisemo kuhaguma kandi ndishimye cyane, kuba ngiye gukomezanya n’ikipe yanjye”.
Jack Grealish nyuma yo kongera amasezerano, yiyongere Ku bandi bakinnyi iyi kipe yaguze barimo Ollie Watkins bakuye muri Brentford mu cyiciro cya kabiri, ndetse na Bertrand Traore na Emiliano Martinez umuzamu w’ikipe ya Arsenal bamaze kumvikana.

Itegeko rizohana abo bose bazohakana ko mu Burundi habaye ihonyabwoko ryakorewe abarundi bo mu bwoko bw-abahutu mu mwaka wa 1972 rigiye gushirwaho mu misi. Vyashikirijwe kuri uyu wa kane n-umukuru w-umurwi wo kwanyisha abarundi no kuvugana ukuru CVR, Pierre-Claver Ndayicariye , hari mu ntara ya Gitega igihe CVR arongoye yariko iremesha ku banyeshure bo muri seminari nkuru ya Gitega. Hari ku bijanye n-ivyo uwo murwi umaze gukora.
Uwo arongoye CVR yarabajijwe ikibazo n-umunyeshure kijanye n-ukuntu CVR yoba ifise uburenganzira bwo kwita izina ubwicanyi bwabaye mu 1972 ko ari jenoside yakorewe abahutu, Ndayicariye yamwishuye ko kwita izina bifise intambuko bigenda bikorerwamwo.
Kubwiwe, Intambuko ya mbere nuko CVR yita izina ivyabaye , iya kabiri akaba ko ari iryo zina rica ryemezwa n-inama nshingamateka . Ubwa gatatu , hagaca haza ishirwaho ry-amategeko harimwo n-ayahana abantu bohakana ko habaye ihonyabwoko ryakorewe abahutu mu mwaka wa 1972. Intambuko ya nyuma akaba ari iyi janye nuko iryo zina rica rijanwa mu nama ijejwe umutekano y-ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU.

APR FC yaraye inaniwe kujya ku mukino wa nyuma, nyuma yo gusezererwa na Mlandege FC yo muri Zanzibar kuri penaliti 4-2 mu mukino wa ½ cy’Irushanwa rya Mapinduzi Cup.
APR FC yatsinzwe na Mlandege FC yo muri Zanzibar kuri penaliti 4-2, isezererwa muri ½ cya Mapinduzi Cup nyuma yo gusoza umukino amakipe yombi anganya 0-0.
Ni umukino watangiye APR FC yari ifite icyizere nyuma yo gusezerera Young Africans muri 1/4 isatira ndetse ku munota wa gatanu gusa Myugariro wayo Niyigena Clement yahushije igite
... 
ande asifura ko habayemo kurarira.
Umunota umwe mbere y’uko igice cya mbere kirangira, Mlandege FC yahushije igitego cyari cyabazwe ubwo umukinnyi wayo wo hagati Abdalla Kulandana yari asigaranye n’Umunyezamu nyuma y’uko ’Pitchou’ yaherejwe umupira n’Umunyezamu Pavelh Ndzila akawugenzura nabi.
Igice cya mbere cyarangiye ari 0-0 ndetse icya kabiri cyaranzwe no gusatira ku mpande zombi aho buri kipe yashakaga igitego.
Ku munota wa 50, APR FC yamanukanye umupira maze Mugisha Gilbert ashyirwa hasi n
...
u mwanya wa penaliti nyuma y’umukino warangiye ari 0-0.
APR FC yasezerewe na Mlandege FC itsinzwe kuri penaliti 4-2. Abakinnyi bayo bazitsinze ni Ndayishimiye Dieudonné na Sanda Soulei mu gihe abazihushije ari Sharaf Eldin Shaiboub Ali na Niyibizi Ramadhan.
Mlandege FC yatsinze APR FC itegereje ku mukino wa nyuma izarokoka hagati ya Simba SC na Singida Fountain Gate zizacakirana ku wa Gatatu, tariki 10 Mutarama 2024.
Ikipe izegukana igikombe izamenyekana ku wa Gatandatu, tariki 13 Mutarama 2024.

Mu gihe mu Rwanda abanyemari badakunze kwiyamamaza babinyujije mu mikino, mu mukino wo gusiganwa mu mamodoka ho bamaze kubona Abaterankunga batari bacye mu irushanwa ryiswe” KCB Gorilla Mountain”. Iri rushanwa rikaba ryitirirwa Banki ya Kenya y’Ubucuruzi ( KCB ) kubera ko ariyo muterankunga wa mbere. Iyi Banki yatanze ibihumbi 50 by’amadolari angana na Miliyoni 27 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda mu rwego kugira ngo irushanwa rizagenda neza.
Nk'uko tubikesha Imvaho Nshya, biravugwa ko babonye abaterankunga bo kugira ngo iryo rushanwa rizagende neza bagera kuri 14 nk’uko bigaragara kuri Lisiti yatugejejeho. Abo baterankunga baza kunganira KCB ni Umubano Hotel, Engen, Az Impex, Private Sector Federation, Rwanda Motors, Phoenix Insurance, Sn Brussels, Sonatube, Secam, Tigo, Sulfo - Nil Mineral Water, Coca-Cola. Biteganyijwe ko iri rushanwa rizatangira taliki ya 30 Nzeri 2011, rikaba rizitabirwa n’amamodoka 22 azaba atwawe n’abashoferi ( Abakinnyi ) nka Conrad Rautenbach, Jas Mangat, Jamie Whyte, Alain Dethise, Bukera Valery, Gincarlo Davite, Jean Yves, Edson Mugyereza, Lubega, Fitidis Kristakis, Mitraros, Kwizera Claude, Muhangi, Bukenya, Kenneth Ntaro, Ashraf, Sebuguuzi.Kwizera Claude, Murengezi John, Kiyaga Geoffrey, Nasser Mutebi, Duncan Mubiru, George Richard, Mayaka Felekin, freddy Rakotomanga na Pansiyano Luakataka. Abo bose buri wese aba afite uwo bicaranye ugenda amuyobora akoresheje i karita.

Muri weekend ishize amashyaka atatu yatangaje abakandida bayo mu matora ya perezida w’u Burundi ateganyijwe mu kwezi kwa gatanu 2020, abakandida bose hamwe bamaze kuba 10.
Gaston Sindimwo ni umukandida wa Uprona akaba asanzwe ari visi perezida w’u Burundi, Jacques Bigirimana w’ishyaka FNL na Anicet Niyonkuru wa CDP.
Aba baje biyongera ku bakandida babiri bigenga aribo Francis Rohero n’umupasiteri Dieudonné Nahimana.
Léonce Ngendakumana wa FRODEBU, Kassim Abdul wa UPD Zigamibanga, Keffa Nibizi wa
... 
yigikiye iriri ku butegetsi ubusanzwe ni umuyobozi waryo akaba n’umuyobozi wa “Office du The du Burundi” (OTB).
Anicet Niyonkuru uyobora ishyaka Conseil Des Patriotes, CDP, ugiye kwiyamamaza, yahoze ari umunyamabanga w’ihuriro ry’abanyapolitiki n’amashyaka atavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi CNARED rikorera mu burayi.
Mu kwezi kwa munani 2019 Niyonkuru yabwiye BBC ko bafite ishyaka ryo gutaha bakajya mu matora n’ubwo ibintu bitaragenda neza ndetse nta kinini cyahindutse mu Burundi.
Yagize ati: “Abatavuga
...
mwarimu w’imiyoborere (governance) muri Kaminuza zo muri Kenya.
Bwana Shikwati agira ati: “Iyo urebye uko kwemeza umukandida wa CNDD-FDD byari bitegerejwe, bikwereka uwari utegerejwe uwo ari we, agomba kuba ari we musimbura wa Perezida Nkurunziza”.
Gusa uyu mwarimu yemeza ko n’umuntu nka Agathon Rwasa mu gihe yakwemezwa n’ishyaka rye, CNL, nk’umukandida, ashobora kuba umwe mu bahabwa amahirwe menshi.
Amatora y’umukuru w’igihugu mu Burundi ateganyijwe tariki 20 Gicurasi 2020.

Mw’ikoraniro mu gisagara ca Cincinnati ejo ku musi wa gatandatu, Romney yavuze ko Amerika ikwiriye umutegetsi mushasha.
Romney yasibiye kubandanya igikorwa ciwe c’ukwiyamamaza inyuma yuko agenywe wicese n’umugambwe wiwew w’Aba Republicains mw’ikoraniro rikuru ry’uwo mugambwe riherutse kubera mu gisagara ca Tampa mu ntara ya Florida.
Muri ico gihe Aba Demokrate baratanguye gushika mu gisagara ca Charlotte, mu ntara ya Caroline yo mu buraruko hazobera ikoraniro rikuru ry’umugambwe w’aba Demokrate kuva ku musi wa kabiri w’iyi ndwi tugiye gutangura.
Prezida wa Amerika, Barack Obama yariyamamaje mu ntara ya Iowa ku musi wa gatandatu.

Ubuyobozi bw’igisagara ca Bujumbura buvuga ko ku munsi ku munsi, abantu bari munsi ya bane hamwe na batanu aribo bakirwa ku bitaro bitandukanye, bafashwe n’ingwara ya Korera mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Mw’itangazo ryasohowe n’umukuru w’igisagara ca Bujumbura kuri uwu wa mbere, Freddy Mbonimpa yamenyesheje ko amazone abangamiwe n’iyo ngwara ya korera ari Kanyosha, Buyenzi, Buterere hamwe na Cibitoke.
Nk’uko biri muri iryo tangazo ryateweko umukono na Freddy Mbonimpa, ubuyobozi bw’igisagara ca Bujumbura bwafashe zimwe mu ngingo z’isuku zizofasha kurwanya iyo ngwara, izo nazo akaba ari uguhagarika ubunywero n’uburiro bwo mu masoko, uguhagarika gutembereza imfungurwa zihiye zidandarizwa mu masorori, hamwe no guhagarika gutembereza amazi yo kunywa atekeye mu bumwanya (Sachets) mu bibanza bihuriramwo abantu benshi.
Ibiharuro bitangwa n’igisata c’amagara y’abantu bivuga ko abantu bashika ijana na mirongo ibiri na batandatu aribo bamaze gufatwa n’iyo ngwara, muri ayo mazone ane yo mu gisagara ca Bujumbura.

Umutoza w’ikipe y’igihugu Amavubi, Umudage Antoine Hey yahamagaye abakinnyi bagera ku icyenda bakina hanze y’u Rwanda, baje kwitegura umukino w’u Rwanda na Centre Afrique uzaba mu kwezi gutaha.
Muri aba bakinnyi bahamagawe nta gutungurana kwigeze kubamo. Nk’umukinnyi Meddie Kagere ukina muri Gor Mahia mu gihugu cya Kenya ukomeje no kwitwara neza, bisa nk’aho ibye n’Amavubi byamaze kurangira ku mpanvu zidasobanutse, n’abandi bakinnyi nka Atuheire Kipson, ukomeje kwitwara neza muri Asia.
Team Manager w’Amavubi EMery Kamanzi yabwiye RuhagoYacu ko bamaze kwandika basaba amakipe kubaha aba bakinnyi bakazafasha muri uyu mukino wo gushaka itike y’igikombe cy’Africa.
" Amakipe aba bakinnyi bakinamo bose twamaze kuyandikira tuyasaba aba bakinnyi, dutegereje ko badusubiza, bakaza gukina uyu mukino," Kamanzi Emery aganira na RuhagoYacu.
" Twifuza ko guhera tariki ya 28 aba bakinnyi baza bagatangira umwiherero na bagenzi babo, ariko bizaterwa n’uko bamwe barangije imikino, kuko nka Sugira azaba afite umukino wa Champions League na Vita Club tariki ya 2 Kamena, bikaba byunvikana ko azaza nyuma."

Biteganyijwe ko muri ibi birori aba mama bakuru bazahabwa umwanya bakamurika imideri mu mishanana n'indi myambaro ikwiye ku mubyeyi w'i Rwanda. Iki gikorwa kizaba tariki ya 10/12/2017 kibere Kigali Serena hotel, kuva saa kumi n'ebyiri z'umugoroba. Kwinjira ni ibihumbi bitatu (3,000Frw) ahasanzwe ndetse na bitanu (5,000Frw) muri VIP.
Iki gikorwa gitegurwa na Berwa Platnum Ltd, ihagarariwe na Ngabitsinze Abdul Wahab hamwe na Murenzi Nurudine. Ibi birori bifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti 'Ubwiza bw'uwikwije' akaba ari inshuro ya kabiri bigiye kubera mu Rwanda. Ubushize iki gikorwa cyabaye tariki 19/11/2016 kibera muri Petit stade i Remera aho cyahurije hamwe aba designers batandukanye barimo Queen fashion, Akariza design, Lucas berwa house of fashion, Ambara super, Delphine design, Hakym design and mama khalim design.

Visi Kapiteni w’ikipe y’Igihugu cy’u Rwanda, Ndizeye Ndayisaba Dieudonné usanzwe ari n’umukinnyi w’ikipe ya Patriots BBC, yasabye umukunzi we, Umutesi Liliane kuzabana akaramata.
Ndizeye asanzwe ari umukinnyi wabigize umwuga mu mukino wa Basketball akaba yambitse impeta umukunzi we Umutesi Liliane amusaba kuzamubera umufasha atazuyaje nawe asubiza ‘yego’.
Mu kiganiro yahaye THEUPDATE, ndizeye yagize ati:”Nibyo koko Liliane namwambitse Impeta musaba ko twazabana, nyuma y’igihe dukundana”.
Muri iki kiganiro, ntago yashimye guhishyura birambutse iby’urukundo rwe Liliane kuko byari ibanga.
Agaruka ku gihe Ubukwe bwabo buzabera, yavuze ko bizajya hanze mu bihe bya vuba.
Ndizeye w’imyaka 27, yamenyekanye cyane ubwo yakiniraga IPRC-Kigali yavuyemo mu 2017 yerekeza muri Patriots akinira kugeza ubu.
Uyu musore uzwiho gutsinda amanota atatu inshuro nyinshi, yatwaranye na Patriots BBC ibikombe bitatu bya shampiyona, ndetse akina imikino ya BAL (Basketball Africa League) inshuro ebyiri zirimo iyo mu 2021 yakiniye Patriots BBC n’uyu mwaka aho yifashishijwe muri REG BBC.
Ndizeye ni umwe mu bakinnyi bakomeye muri Basketball y’u Rwanda. Mu 2017 ni bwo yatangiye gukinira Ikipe y’Igihugu y’u Rwanda ndetse mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019 yatowe nk’umukinnyi mwiza wa shampiyona [MVP].

Umukino w’umunsi wa Gatanu wa shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya mbere mu Bagabo, wahuje Rutsiro FC na Rayon Sports, wasigiye agatubutse Abanya-Rutsiro.
Uyu mukino wabaye ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 28 Nzeri 2024, ubera kuri Stade Umuganda guhera Saa cyenda z’amanywa. Abakunzi b’amakipe yombi ariko biganjemo Aba-Rayons, ni bo bari benshi kuri uyu mukino.
Amakuru UMUSEKE wamenye, ni uko bwari ubwa mbere itike yo kwinjira kuri Stade Umuganda igeze ku bihumbi 3 Frw. Ibi byanatumye Rutsiro FC isigarana agatubutse kuri konti ya yo.
Uyu mukino wasigiye iyi kipe miliyoni 8 Frw zirenga nk’uko byemejwe n’Umuyobozi wa yo, Nsanzineza Ernest.
Ati “Uyu mukino winjije miliyoni 8 Frw zirengaho.”
N’ubwo Rutsiro FC yasigaranye ubwatsi, ariko amanota yatashye mu Nzove nyuma yo gutsindwa igitego 1-0 cyatsinzwe na Iraguha Hadji wahoze akinira iyi kipe yo mu Burengerazuba.
Abanya-Rutsiro bafite amanota arindwi mu mikino ine bamaze gukina. Batsinze Vision FC, Bugesera FC, banganya na AS Kigali, batsindwa na Rayon Sports. Iyi kipe ifite umukino w’ikirarane izakina na APR FC.
UMUSEKE.RW

Umuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo ca Leta y’urwanda kijejwe kuraba ukwo ibinyamakuru bikora (RBA), Arthur Asiimwe yasubije igisirikare c’uburundi giheruka kwagiriza tereviziyo y’urwanda gucapfuza ishusho y’ingabo zaco ziri mu buseruko bwa Congo mu butumwa bwa EAC. Uwurongoye RBA akavuga ko ivyo vyashikirijwe n’iyo tereviziyo atabwo ari iciyumviro canke icipfuzo ca Leta y’urwanda canke ica RBA ko ahubwo ari iciyumviro cashikirijwe n’umuntu ku gatwe kiwe.
Asiimwe yagize ati :”Ntabwo ari iciyumviro ca Leta 
... 
abivuze nk’umuntu yigenga. Ivyo yavuze ntibisigura ko bishigikiwe na Leta y’urwanda canke RBA, ahubwo yatanze iciyumviro nk’uwundi mutumire wese afise ukwo abona ibintu”
Tubamenyeshe ko kuwa 14 Rusama 2023, Kuri iyo mboneshakure yo mu Rwanda haciye ikiganiro “Ishusho y’icyumwero” cari catumiwemwo Evode Uwizeyimana na Gasominari Jean Baptiste aho basesangura ku ngabo z’umuryango wa Afrika y’amaja epfo (SADC) zishobora kuja mu gihugu ca Congo na cane cane mu buseruko bw’ico gihugu guhangana n’umuh
...
birwanisho nka Nyatura na FDRL zikayiha imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare mu ntara ya Kivu y’uburaruko neza na neza muri teritwari ya Masisi.
Inyuma y’indwi imwe gusa Ico kiganiro caraciye kw’iyo mboneshakure y’urwanda, Umuvugizi w’igisirikare c’uburundi yatangajeko abasirikare babo barungitswe mu buseruko bwa Congo bakora neza bimwe vyo gushimirwa. Floribert Biyereke akagiriza ariko tereviziyo y’urwanda kuvyo iheruka gutangaza kw’izo ngabo zabo ziri muri Congo ko ari igitutsi kuri zo.

Umukuru w’igihugu ca Tanzania Samia Suluhu Hassan yashize kumeza imiriyoni 5 kuri buri mukinyi wa Young Africans hamwe na Simba Sc azokwinjiza igitsindo .
Kuri uyu wa kabiri igenekerezo rya 14 Ruhuhuma 2023 , umukuru w’igihugu ca Tanzania Samia Suluhu Hassan yemereye abakinyi ba Young Africans na Simba Sc bazotsinda igitsindo mu nkino zo mumatsinda ya CAF Champions League hamwe na Caf Confederation Cup .
Simba Sc mu rukino rwa mbere rwo mu matsinda yatsinzwe na Horoya Fc igitsindo 1-0 , mugihe Young Africans mu rukino rwayo rwa mbere rwo mu matsinda ya Caf confederation Cup watsinzwe ibitsindo 2-0 n’umurwi wa US Minatir wo muri Tunisie .
Umurwi wa Simba Sc ugiye kwakira Raja Casablanca yo muri Maroc mu rukino rugira kabiri rwo mu matsinda ruzoba kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 18 Ruhuhuma 2023 i Dar es Salaam ku kibuga citiriwe Mupaka , mugihe Young Africans izokwakira TP Mazembe mu rukino rugira kabiri rwo mu matsinda ruzoba kuri uyu w’ Imana igenekerezo rya 19 Ruhuhuma 2023 ku kibuga co kwa Mukapa .
Mwomenyako Young Africans ariyo yatahukanye igikombe c’Umwaka uheze mugihe Simba Sc yoyo yafashe ikibanza ca kabiri .

Abafite indwara z’ubuhumekero baragirwa inama yo kwegera abaganga bakababwira uko bagomba kwirinda icyorezo cya Corona Virus (COVID-19) ndetse n’ubwoko bw’agapfukamunwa bagomba kwambara.
Bamwe mu bafite indwara z’ubuhumekero bo muri Kigali (ariko bitari ngombwa ko dutangaza amazina yabo) babwiye ikinyamakuru impamba.com ko bitewe n’uburwayi basanganywe iyo bambaye agapfukanunwa bibagiraho ingaruka nko kubura umwuka.
Umwe bu bafite uburwayi bw’ubuhumekero yagize ati “iyo nambaye agapfukanunwa mbu
... 
abo bantu barwaye indwara z’ubuhumekero ari bo bagomba kwirinda cyane icyorezo cya Corona Virus (COVID-19) kuko iyo ndwara iyo ibagezeho ibamerera nabi cyane, ati “Ariko na none nibo bakeneye kwirinda COVID-19 cyane kuko iyo ibagezeho ibibasira kurusha abadafite izo ndwara”.
Umuyobozi wa RBC yemeza ko umuntu usanzwe uhumeka bimugoye nawe agomba kwirinda kujya ahateraniye abantu benshi mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Corona Virus, yagize ati “Hari abantu bagira uburwayi bukomeye busaba ko umwu
...
kibazo”.
CP John Bosco Kabera yakomeje agira ati “icya kabiri cyiyongereyeho ni ukwirinda COVID-19, umuntu wese agomba kwambara agapfukamunwa, tugomba kumva ko kwambara agapfukamunwa ari ihame, abaturage bagerageza gukurikiza amabwiriza kugira ngo birinde kino cyorezo”.
Ubuyobozi bwa RBC burasaba Abaturarwanda kurushaho kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda Corona Virus ari yo: Gusiga intera ya metero, kwambara udupfukamunwa no gukaraba intoki kenshi bakoresheje amazi meza n’isabune cyangwa alukoro.

Madame Victoire Ingabire akaba ashinjwa n'ubutegetsi bwa Kagame Paul ibyaha by'iterabwoba n'ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside nk'uko bitang
... 
n'ibiro ntaramakuru bya AFP. Umushinjacyaha Mukuru wungirije Bwana Alphonse Hitayezu ari imbere y'abacamanza yagize ati :"Turasabira Madame Victoire Ingabire igihano cyo gufungwa burundu"!
Madame Victoire Ingabire akaba ari umunyapolitike utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwa Kagame akaba n'umuyobozi w'ishyaka rya FDU, akaba yarabaga mu gihugu cy'Ubuholandi , akaba yaraje mu Rwanda ashaka kwiyamamariza kuba Perezida wa Repubulika mu matora yari ateganyijwe mu mwaka w'2010, mbere y'ayo matora yaje gufun
...
 Kagame amushinja iterabwoba n'ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside ! Yashakiwe abamushinja ibinyoma , biba ngombwa ko Madame Victoire Ingabire yikura muri urwo rubanza kuko yari amaze kubona ko adashobora guhabwa ubutabera buboneye n'inkiko z'u Rwanda zitigenga.
Urubanza rwe rwatangiye mu kwezi kwa Nzeri 2011 , nyuma yo gusabirwa igifungo cya burundu n'ubushinjacyaha uyu munsi , hateganyijwe ko urukiko ruzatanga umwanzuro wa nyuma ku italiki ya 29 z'ukwei kwa gatandatu 2012.

Ibiro vy’ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU bijejwe kwitaho impunzi kw’isi HCR bimenyesha ko bibabajwe n’ingingo y’igihugu ca Israyeli yo kuva mu masezerano yo kwimura abimukira b’abanya Eritreya n’Abanya Sudani ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bariko bararondera ubuhungiro. Ivyo biro bibandanya kwizera ko ico kibazo kizotorerwa inyishu vuba.
Muri aka kanya hari abimukira b’abanya Eritreya n’Abanyasudani bashika ibihumbi mirongo itatu n’icenda bariko barasaba ubuhungiro muri Israyeli, benshi muribo bakaba baba mu bigwati bikenye vy’igisagara ca Tel Aviv.
Ku musi wa mbere w’iyi ndwi, Israyeli na ONU vyari vyatangaje ko vyapfunditse amasezerano yo kurungika bamwe muri abo bimukira mu bihugu vyo mu burengero bw’isi, kandi ko bagiye kwemerera abasigaye guhabwa impapuro zibagenga vy'agateganyo bagashobora kurondera ubuzi.
Uwo mugambi wa Netanyahu watumye haduka amatati menshi mu mugwi w’abanyepolitike begamiye ubutegetsi bwiwe bo babona ko abo banyafrika bari muri ico gihugu batisunze amategeko.
Benjamin Netanyahu yaciye akura igihugu muri ayo masezerano yapfunditse na ONU haciye umusi umwe.
William Spindler umuvugizi wa HCR avuga ko muri aka kanya ata n'umwe azi ibigiye gukwirikira ku kibazo c’abo bimukira.

Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 27 Gicurasi 2017 ahagana saa Munani z’amanywa i Shyorongo habereye impanuka ikomeye yahitanye ubuzima bwa benshi. Polisi y’u Rwanda yatangaje ko abamaze kuboneka bahitanywe n’iyi mpanuka ari abantu 15.
Imodoka itwara abagenzi (Coaster) ya Kigali Safariyavaga i Musanze igana Kigali, yakoze impanuka igeze mu makorosi y’i Shyorongi, irenga umuhanda igwa mu manga, ihitana ubuzima bw’abantu 15. Iyi mpanuka yabereye hafi y’aho bakunze ku Giti cy’Inyoni uzamuka i Shyorongi mu Murenge wa Kanyinya, mu kagari ka Gatare.
Iyi mpanuka yatewe n’igikamyo cya rukururana gifite ibice bibiri nyuma icy’inyuma gitandukana n’ikindi maze aba ari cyo gihitana iyo modoka y’abagenzi. Abari hafi y'ahabereye iyi mpanuka bavuga yatewe n’umuvuduko mwinshi iyi modoka itwara abagenzi yagenderagaho.
Umuvugizi w’Ishami rya Polisi rishinzwe umutekano wo mu muhanda, CIP Emmanuel Kabanda, aganira n'itangazamakuru yagize ati “Mu kagari ka Gatare mu Murenge wa Kanyinya, Akarere ka Nyarugenge habereye impanuka ikomeye. Police yahise itabara. Abantu bayiguyemo bamaze kuboneka ni 15 barimo abana bato 2. Abo ni abari muri coaster yakoze impanuka. Ubutabazi burakomeje, amakuru arambuye turayabagezaho nyuma”.
TANGA IGITECYEREZO

Gusubika aya matora cyari icyemezo cya Perezida Macky Sall, ndetse n’Abadepite bari babyemeye, ariko Urukiko rushinzwe kurinda Itegeko Nshinga ruza kwanga iki cyemezo, ruvuga ko kwigiza inyuma amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu yari ateganyijwe tariki 25 Gashyantare 2024, binyuranyije n’amategeko, runatesha agaciro Iteka rya Perezida Macky Sall riyimurira mu kwezi k’Ukuboza 2024.
Nyuma y’iki cyemezo cy’Urukiko rushinzwe kurinda Itegeko Nshinga, Perezida Macky Sall yemeye kubaha icyo cyemezo, ndetse ana
... 
za ko ataziyamamariza manda ya gatatu, nk’uko abantu benshi babikekaga ahubwo atumiza inama yabaye mu cyumweru gishize, ngo bige kuri iki kibazo cy’igihe aya matora azabera.
Iyo nama yarebeye hamwe uko igihugu cya Senegal gihagaze nk’igihugu cya Afurika gifite Demokarasi ihamye, maze Perezida Macky Sall yemera ko amatora agomba kuba.
Perezida Macky Sall abinyujije ku rubuga rwe rwa Twitter, muri Nyakanga 2023 yanditse ubutumwa bumenyesha abaturage ba Senegal ko n’ubwo Itegeko Nshinga ry’iki gihu
...
mwemerera kongera kwiyamamaza, we ku giti cye yafashe icyemezo cyo kutaziyamamariza indi manda mu matora ateganyijwe mu mwaka wa 2024.
Igihugu cya Senegal kigendera ku mahame ya Demokarasi, kikaba kitarigeze kibamo coup d’état, mu gihe mu bindi bihugu bimwe byo muri Afurika abayobozi bamwe bagenda bavanwa ku butegetsi hatubahirijwe Itegeko Nshinga, ndetse ugasanga ubutegetsi bufashwe n’igisirikare.
Perezida Macky Sall yagiye ku butegetsi mu 2012, akaba yari amaze kwiyamamariza manda ebyiri gusa.

Kylian Mbappé mu nzira imwerekeza muri Arsenal FC.
Rutahizamu w'ikipe y'igihugu y'u Bufaransa Kylian Mbappé ukinira ikipe ya Paris Saint Germain nyuma y'igihe kirekire amaze avugwa mu ikipe ya Real Madrid ubu byatangiye guhindura isura aho bivugwa ko iyi kipe itacyimwifuza bitewe n'uko uyu musore ari kuyaka amafaranga y'umurengera ngo dore ko ashaka umushara wenda gukuba kabiri uwa Bellingham umeze neza cyane mur'iyi minsi.
Amahirwe yo kuba Arsenal yashinyisha Kylian Mbappé akomeje kwiyongera umunsi ku w'undi bitewe n'inkuru ziri kuva i Madrid zivuga ko Real Madrid yamaze kuva muri gahunda yo gusinyisha Mbappé iyi nkuru nziza itegerejwe n'abakunzi ba Arsenal kugira ngo Mikel Arteta agire ikipe imeze nka Manchester City.
Ikipe ya Arsenal yagaragaje ko yifuza cyane Kylian Mbappé n'ubwo benshi babona bitazayorohera kuko uyu musore w'Umufaransa yifuza Real Madrid kandi nta makuru yizewe y'uko Real Madrid yaba yaramaze gufata umwanzuro wo kureka gusinyisha Mbappé.
Â

Uheruka ni Leah Karegeya, umupfakazi w’umwe mu bashinze uyu mutwe w’iterabwoba, Patrick Karegeya.
Leah Karegeya yari mu bakomeye muri komite y’uyu mutwe, yaje kuyivanamo biciye mu rwandiko yandikiye umuhuzabikorwa wa RNC, Jerome Nayigiziki tariki 30 Ukuboza 2019.
Muri uru rwandiko ruvuga ukwegura, Leah yavuze ko yeguye kubera ko komite yari ayoboye itizewe, ku buryo imyanzuro bafata idahabwa agaciro.
Yagize ati “Nasanze nta mpamvu yo kuguma kuba umuyobozi mu gihe nka komite yahawe inshingano zo 
... 
avuga ko Micombero ari muri aba batishimye.
Ati “Imbarutso ibiri inyuma ni ibura rya Benjamin Rutabana, uheruka kuvugana n’umuryango we ubwo yari muri Uganda muri Nzeri 2019.”
Rutabana wari komiseri ushinzwe kongera ubushobozi, yari muri Uganda mu rugendo rw’akazi. Umugore we yandikiye ibaruwa ubuyobozi bwa RNC abaza aho umugabo we aherereye, gusa Kayumba Nyamwasa nta gisubizo yamuhaye.
Amakuru avuga ko kugeza ubu abo mu muryango wa Rutabana nabo biyemeje guhangana na Nyamwasa, n’abarimo muramu 
...
sha icyenewabo no kwigwizaho iby’uyu mutwe.
Kayumba yagiye akorana bya hafi n’abo mu muryango we barimo muramu we, Frank Ntwari, uyu akaba yaranamuhaye imbaraga zo kuba komiseri ushinzwe urubyiruko.
Ntwari yagiye ashinjwa n’umugore wa Rutabana, Diane Rutabana ko ari umuntu wagiye atera ubwoba umugabo we.
Diane yavuze ko inshuro nyinshi yagiye agaragaza ikibazo afite. Yabwiye Ijwi rya Amerika ko Ntwari yagiye atera ubwoba Rutabana, ko mu gihe yaba asubiye muri Uganda azamufunga.

WASHINGTON, DC —
Polisi y’u Rwanda ivuga ko igikora iperereza ku mikorere y’abantu 11bo mw’itsinda ryitwa Intwarane, bakomoka muri Kiliziya gatolika y’u Rwanda. Umunyamakuru w'Ijwi ry'Amerika Etienne Karekezi aravugana n’umuvugizi wa polisi y’u Rwanda ACP Theos Badege uri i Kigali mu Rwanda.
Tukivuga kuri iyi nkuru y’itsinda ryitwa Intwarane, umunyamakuru w'Ijwi ry'Amerika Auriane Itangishaka yavuganye na John Niyumukiza, uvuga ko ari umukozi w'Imana. Aradusobanurira uko yumva ikibazo cy'abo bantu b'Intwarane n'ifungwa ryabo.

Minisiteri ya siporo mu Rwanda kuriki gicamunsi nayo yifatanije nabandi ba siportif mu kwihanganisha umuryango wa Niyibigira Patrick wari umukozi wa Gasogi united witabye Imana azize impanuka.
Ku munsi wejo taliki ya 29 zukwa karindwi nibwo hamenyekanye inkuru y’incamugongo ko Niyibigira Patrick wari team manager wa Gasogi united yitabye Imana azize impanuka, abasportif muri rusange bakomeje kwihanganisha umuryango we ndetse n’ikipe yararimo ya Gasogi united kubwo kubura umugabo w’ingenzi.
Minisiteri ya siporo nayo yatangaje ko ibabajwe n’urupfu rwuyu mugabo inihanganisha umuryango we n’abandi basportif muri rusange mu butumwa bugira buti: minispor yifatanyije mu kababaro n’umuryango wa Niyibigira Patrick ndetse n’uwabasportif bose kubw’urupfu rwe, Niyibigira Patrick yari team manager w’ikipe ya Gasogi united gusa yari afite n’indi mirimo yo guteza sport imbere mu Rwanda.
Niyibigira Patrick yari umutoza w’imikino ngiroramubiri, umusifuzi w’umupira w’amaguru ndetse akaba yari na team manager wa Gasogi united kurubu, amakipe menshi yo mu Rwanda yagiye amwifuriza iruhuko ridashira anahumuriza umuryango we n’abamuzi Bose.
Written by Gentil Venuste

... 
gira kabiri mu mwaka. Turungukira cane ku tuntu n’utundi tw’abo bavukanyi be n’utw’abakenyezi babo, igihe baba bubatse. Abo bacungezi baratugendera cungere bari kumwe n’abakurambere, bakongera bagatanga insiguro ziremesha ku makoraniro no ku materaniro kugira ngo badukomeze.—Ivyakozwe 15:35.

Ibikuru bikuru vyaranze igenekerezo nkiri

Abasenateri bo mu ishyaka Union Sacrée de la nation bashyigikiye ubutegetsi buriho, basabye bagenzi babo gushyigikira ko Republika ya Demokarasi ya Congo yivana mu muryango w’ibihugu bikoresha igifaransa, ukuriwe n’umunyarwandakazi Louise Mushikiwabo kuri ubu.
Impamvu Abasenateri bashingiraho muri iki gihugu, ni uko bavuga ko batakabaye bari kumwe muri uyu muryango n’u Rwanda bashinja gufasha M23.
Aba bashingamategeko ba Congo baravuga ko umuryango mpuzamahanga ndetse n’akarere igihugu giherereyemo muri rusange, babatereranye mu kibazo cy’intambara mu burasirazuba.
Abasenateri ba Union Sacrée bavuze ko bashyigikiye byimazeyo perezida wabo ndetse ngo banashyigikiye ibiganiro by’amahoro bya Luanda na Nairobi.
Nk’uko bisanzwe aba banyapolitiki basabye ko abanyekongo bakunda igihugu kandi bakitabira kujya mu gisirikare ari benshi, nk’uko umunyamakuru w’ikinyamakru Politico yabyanditse.
Hagati aho ubuzima bwahagaze mu mujyi wa Butembo mu ntara ya Nord Kivu, nyuma y’imirwano yahanganishije umutwe w’Abamayi-mayi n’ingabo za leta mu birindiro bya FARDC biri ahitwa Mihake muri komini Bulengera.
Muri iyi mirwano byavuzwe ko umusirikare wa leta yahasize ubuzima kandi ngo muri Butembo hari ikibazo cy’umutekano muke, ahanini ushingiye kukuba abamayi-mayi bakunze kugaba ibitero ku ngabo za leta.
Biravugwa ko kuri uyu wa Gatatu abakuru b’Ibihugu by’u Rwanda, u Burundi na Congo Kinshasa bahurira i Luanda muri Angola, bakaganira ku kibazo cy’umutekano muke mu burasirazuba bwa Congo.

#Burundi| Ivy’Umutarianokazi yirukanwe ubutarariye mu Gihugu cacu.
Umutarianokazi yitwa Pamela yari asanzwe ariko aratanga icirwa kubaharanira agateka ka zinamuntu i Burundi, yurijwe indege ubutarariye.
Imvo rero yabitumye si iyindi. Neza na neza mu kiringo ngo yariko arakora icamuzanye muri kino gihugu naco akaba kwari ukwigisha abaranira agateka ka muntu ibijanye n’uko n’ibitegakanijwe vyose n’amategeko kugira ngo ushobore kwitwara muri ya Sentare Mpanavyaga mpuzamakungu CPI; uwo mupfasoni ngo yaciye atangura gushikiriza ibintu bitahumurije namba abariko baramwumviriza, ariko kubatuma bagira ubwoba maze bakabishikana hejuru.
Ingingo yaciye ifatwa dari dari y’umukumurungika ubutarariye iyo yaje ava, nkuko mubibona aho ku masanamu ariko yegeranya ibirago aho yari arindiriye indenge imwihutisha.

Intumwa z'ibihugu by'ibihangange na Irani kuri gahunda yayo ya "nucléaire" basubitse imishyirano barimo i Vienne muri Autriche. Bavuga ko hari intambwe bateye ariko ko hakiri inzira ndende.
Imishyikirano imaze ibyumweru bibiri. Abadipolomate bayirimo bayisubitse uyu munsi kugirango babanze bagishe inama guverinoma zabo. Bazongera guhura mu cyumweru gitaha.
Abakuriye intumwa z'Uburusiya, iza Irani, n'iz'Umuryango w’ubumwe bw’ibihugu by’Ubulayi, bose ku buryo butandukanye, batangaje ko imishyikirano itera intambwe nziza, n'ubwo hakiri inzitizi zikomeye. Ariko nta n'umwe wasobanuye ibyo bamaze kumvikanaho n'ibyo batumvikanaho.
Iyi mishyikirano igamije kugarura Irani na Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika mu masezerano yo mu 2015, abuza Irani gukomeza kuyungurura ubutare bwa "uranium." Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika yayasohotsemo mu 2018, Irani nayo ihita isubukura ibikorwa byayo.
I Vienne, Irani na Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika ntibavugana amaso mu yandi. Baganira bamwe bari ukwabo abandi bari ukwabo babifashijwemo n'intumwa z'ibindi bihugu bikiri mu masezerano yo mu 2015, ari byo Ubushinwa, Ubufaransa, Uburusiya, Ubwongereza n'Ubudage, hiyongereyeho Umuryango w’ubumwe bw’ibihugu by’Ubulayi.
Imishyikirano igamije kumvikana ku ntambwe Irani igomba gutera kugirango yubahirize amaserano, n'izo Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika igomba gutera kugirango iyasubiremo, by'umwihariko ibihano igomba gukuriraho Irani.

Ikipe ya ESPOIR FC Espoir FC yamanuwe mu Cyiciro cya Gatatu nyuma yo gukurwaho amanota 50 y’imikino yose yakinishijemo Umunyezamu w’Umunye-Congo Christian Watanga Milembe utari ufite ibyangombwa.
Iyi kipe yatewe mpaga y’imikino 16 isigarana amanota 7 ayigira iya nyuma mu itsinda B kubera gukinisha umukinnyi Christian WATANGA MILEMBE utujuje ibyangombwa.
Iki cyemezo cyakurikiye icyo kuyikura mu makipe abiri ya mbere ahatanira kuzamuka mu Cyiciro cya Mbere.
Mu ibaruwa FERWAFA yandikiye Espoir FC yo mu karere ka Rusizi, yayibwiye ko yakuweho amanota 50 yabonetse mu mikino uriya munyekongo yakinnye isigarana arindwi.
Yayibukije ko itegeko rivuga ko ikipe ya nyuma mu itsinda rya shampiyona y’icyiciro cya kabiri ihita imanuka mu cyiciro cya gatatu bityo bibabayeho kuko ari abanyuma n’amanota 7 basigaranye.
Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) ryafashe umwanzuro wo guhana Espoir FC ku wa 20 Gicurasi, nyuma y’ikirego cyatanzwe na AS Muhanga.
FERWAFA yavuze ko ishingiye ku makuru yatanzwe na AS Muhanga, ku wa 20 Gicurasi “yasuzumwe na Komisiyo y’amarushanwa igasanga hari umukinnyi wa Espoir FC witwa Christian Watanga Milembe ukina adafite icyangombwa kimwemerera gukina gitangwa na FERWAFA.”
Ibi byatumye ikura Espoir FC mu mikino ya play offs none byarangiye inayimanuye mu cyiciro cya kabiri.

Guverinoma ya Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, yasabye Ambasaderi mushya wagenwe guhagararira iki Gihugu mu Rwanda, kuba aretse gutanga impapuro zimwemerera gutangira izi nshingano, ndetse inahamagaza ushinzwe ibikorwa muri Ambasade yayo mu Rwanda.
Itangazo ryashyizwe hanze na Guverinoma ya Congo Kinshasa kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 31 Ukwakira 2022, yibukije ko inama y’ikirenga ishinzwe umutekano yateranye ku ya 29 Ukwakira 2022 iyobowe na Perezida Felix Tshisekedi, yasabye ko Ambasaderi 
... 
ubahirizwa bitarenze ku wa Gatatu tariki 02 Ugushyingo 2022.
Gusa kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 31 Ukwakira 2022, Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Congo, Vincent Karega, we yavuye i Kinshasa ndetse akaba yanagaragaje ifoto yafashe ari kumwe n’abakozi bo muri Ambasade mbere yo kuva muri Congo.
Muri iri tangazo rya Christophe Lutundula, yaboneyeho gusaba Ambasaderi mushya washyizweho guhagararira Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo mu Rwanda, kuba aretse gushyikiriza ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda impapuro zemwe
...
eru gishize ubwo Congo Kinshasa yirukanaga uhagarariye u Rwanda muri iki Gihugu.
Nyuma y’amasaha 24 Congo ifashe iki cyemezo cyababaje u Rwanda, Perezida wa Congo, Felix Tshisekedi yakiriye Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Angola, António Tete waje amuzaniye ubutumwa yahawe na Perezida João Lourenço usanzwe ari umuhuza hagati y’u Rwanda na Congo.
Ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Mbere kandi, António Tete yanakiriwe na Perezida Paul Kagame, na we amushyikiriza ubutumwa bwa João Lourenço.

Umwami mushasha wa Arabia Saudite, Salman, yameye kubandanya imigambi y’uwo bavukana, nyakwigendera umwami Abdullah, yashinguwe ku musi wa gatanu, ku murwa mukuru, Riyadh.
Umwami, Adbullah, yitavye Imana, mu masaha yakare yo ku musi wa gatanu, yashinguwe inyuma y’ibirori bisanzwe, vyarimwo abategetsi bakomeye b’ibihugu vy’Abarabu, n’aba Islamu, vyo mu bice bitandukanye vyo kw’isi.
Umwami, Addullah, avurwa ko yari afise imyaka mirongo icenda y’amavuko. Yari aherutse kuja mu bitaro, kubera ibibazo vyo mu mahaha. Yasandavye igihe c’isaha indwi zo mw’ijoro, mu masaha yo muri Arabia Saudite.
Arabia Saudit,e yarihutiye kugena umwami mushasha, Salman, mw’ijambo yashikirije kuri televiziyo, yavuze kw’azobandanya imigambi irashe y’abayoboye Arabia Saudite, imbere yiwe.
Umwami mushasha, Salman, avurwa ko afise imyaka mirongo irindwi n’icenda yariumushikiranganji ajewe kwivuna abansi kuva mu mwaka w’2012.
Mu bategetsi b’ibihugu vyo kw’isi bashikirije ubutumwa bw’umubabaro, prezida wa Amerika, Barack Obama, yarashikirije ubutumwa bw’Abanyamerika, bw’ukwifatanya n’abanya Arabia Saudite, n’umuryango wa cami wa Arabia Saudite.
Umwami Abdullah, yari yimitswe icese mu mwaka w’2005. Yamara, mu vy’ukuri, yayoboye Arabia Saudite, kuva mu mwaka w’1995, igihe uwo bavukana yari yasubiriye, umwami, Faud, yari yakitswe n’amagara.

Ku wa 1 Nzeri 2020 ni bwo igihe cy’inyongera kingana n’iminsi 60 FERWAFA cyahawe Rayon Sports ngo ibe yamaze kwishyura umwenda bafitiye umutoza Ivan Minnaert ungana na miliyoni 13 836 Frw kubera kumwirukana binyuranyije n’amategeko cyarangiye.

... 
cy’iminsi 60 cyo kwishyura Ivan Minnaert.
Muri iyi minsi 60, Ivan Minnaert akaba yarishyuwe amadorali ibihumbi 2 gusa.
Nyuma yo gusesengura iki kibazo, komisiyo ishinzwe imyitwarire ya FERWAFA yafatiye ibihano Rayon Sports byo kutandikisha abakinnyi kugeza igihe izishyurira umutoza Ivan Jacky Minnaert.
Tariki ya 27 Mata 2018, Ivan Jacky Minnaert yasinye amasezerano y’imyaka 2 atoza ikipe ya Rayon Sports, tariki ya 20 Nyakanga 2018 yaje guhabwa ibaruwa imusezera ku mirimo ye.

Nyuma yaho Rayon Sports yaje kujuriria uyu mwanzuro maze mu Kuboza 2019 Komisiyo y’Ubujujirire mu Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) yemeje ko Rayon Sports igomba kwishyura uwahoze ari umutoza wayo, Umubilgi Iva Minnaert, miliyoni 13.56 Frw.

Abahitanywe n'inkangu Gakenke bashinguwe
Abo bashinguwe uno munsi ni icenda barimwo batanu bo mu muryango umwe, bakaba bari mu gitigiri c'abagera ku 53 bahitanywe n'ingaruka z'imvura ikabije.
Uretse ko yahitanye abantu. iyo mvura yarononye n'ibintu, aho muri kino gihe ibarabara riva mu murwa mukuru Kigali rija mu ntara z'igihugu, nk'aherekeza Muhanga hahoze ari Gitarama, Huye hahoze hitwa Butare na Rusizi hahaoze ari Cyangugu ubu hadahita.
Ku kiraro ca Nyabarongo ubu amazi aracarengeye ku buryo ata modokari zishobora kujabuka.
Vyatumye urudandazwa hagati y'umuji wa Kigali n'iyindi miji mikuru yo mu bumanuko bw'igihugu ndetse no mu bihugu bihana imbibe, rusa n'uruhagaze.
Hari impungenge ko ibintu bishobora gukomeza kwononekara hamwe iyindi mvura yorwa vuba.

Australia gishaka kuba igihugu kidandaza urumogi rwinshi kw’isi
Leta ya Australia yamenyesheje ko ishaka kuba igihugu ca mbere kigurisha urumogi rukoreshwa mu buvuzi kw’isi yose.
Icyo gihugu kiriko kiritegura gusubiramwo amategeko yaco kugira kimere cyo kimwe na Canada hamwe n’Ubuholane , ubu ari byo bihugu vyonyene bishora urumogi mu bindi bihugu.
Ibihugu bya Uruguay na Israel na byo nyine bifite imigambi nk’iyo.
Umushikiranganji w’amagara y’abantu muri Australia Greg Hunt yavuze ko iyo ngingo izofasha n’abagwayi bo muri icyo gihugu.
Icyo gihugu cyemeje gukoresha urumogi nk’umuti mu mwaka wa 2016
Kunywa urumogi nko kwinezereza, biracabujijwe.
“Intumbero yacu iragaragara: Abarimyi n’abafite amahinguriro b’abanye Australia bazoronka akaryo keza ko kuba aba mbere mu kudandaza urumogi rukoreshwa muvyo amagara y’abantu kw’isi,” ni ko Hunt yavuze.
Amahera azava mu rudandazwa rw’urumogi kw’isi azoba agera ku miriyaridi 55 z’amadolari gushika mu 2025, nk’uko byaharuwe n’ikompanyi yo muri Amerika ya Grand View Research.
Mu ntango y’iyi ndwi, intara ya California yo muri Amerika, yabaye intara ya mbere nini irekuye ko abantu bashobora kunywa urumogi mu ntumbero yo kwinezereza

Ijwi ry’Amerika: Claude Gatebuke na Innocent Twagiramungu muri Dusangire Ijambo
Claude Gatebuke na Innocent Twagiramungu baganiye n’Ijwi ry’Amerika mu kiganiro Dusangire Ijambo aho bagize icyo bavuga kw’icibwa ry’urubanza ryuwahoze ari Perezida wa Tchad,Hissène Habré. Bombi bakaba bemeje ko abanyagitugu bose cyane cyane muri Afurika bica cyangwa bagahohotera abo bayobora ko bazabibazwa.
Nubwo batavuze amazina, njye uwo nahise ntekereza ni Kagame. Uyu munyagitugu umaze kwica aba perezida hafi 4, abanyekongo n’abanyarwanda batagira ingano, byanze bikunze nawe azabibazwa mu gihe atazaba ari Perezida ndetse akaba ari nayo mpamvu ashaka kuguma k’ubutegetsi ku ngufu.
Tega amatwi Claude Gatebuke na Innocent Twagiramungu:

IGISOMWA CA MBERE

Ncuti zanje,
Ubu ndanezerewe mu kubabara ku bwanyu, kandi ivyasigaye ku magorwa ya Kristu ndabiherahereza mu mubiri wanje ku bw’Umubiri wiwe ari wo Ekleziya. Ni yo nshinzwe gukorera kubera rya teka natewe n’Imana ry’ukubigisha bimwe birangutse ijambo ryayo, ryo kubafoborera rya banga ryahishijwe imyaka abantu ba kera, rigaseruka ubu mu beranda bayo.
Koko, hagati y’ibihugu vy’abanyamahanga, Imana yarashimye
... 
diseya n’abandi benshi batarigera bankubita ijosho, kugira ngo imishaha yabo ireme kandi, mu kwifatanya mu rukundo, bashikire amatungo yose y’ubwenge butamuruye, babone kumenya ibanga ry’lmana ari ryo Kristu, kuko muri We ari ho amatungo yose y’ubwenge n’ubumenyi yihishije.
IZABURI 61 (62) 6-7, 9
Icit.: Ubukiriro bwanje n’ubuninahazwa bwanje,
ndabukesha Imana!
Niwiruhukire mu Mana, mushaha wanje,
ni Yo uzeyeko urukiza:
ni yo kinja ryanje, ni yo bukiriro bwanje,
ni yo nkinzo yanje, eka nta co nin
...
ayo baramurereka, baraba ko amukiza ku musi w’isabato ngo bamurege. Ariko we yari azi ivyiyunviro vyabo. Arahava abarira nya muntu yari amugaye ukuboko ati: «Va hasi uze uhagarare ino hagati.» Arava hasi, arahagarara. Yezu ababwira ati: «Ndababajije ko birekuriwe gukora iciza canke ikibi ku musi w’isabato, gukiza umuntu canke kumwica?» Abitegereje bose, aramubarira ati: «Ramvura ukuboko.» Uno arakuramvura, ukuboko kwiwe na kwo guca kurakira.
Na bo buzuye ishavu, baja inama y’ingene bogenza Yezu.

ari yo ariko na none biterwa n’umusifuzi.

Mukura VS ni yo yatwaye igikombe cy’Agaciro itsinze Rayon Sports ku mukino wa nyuma.

Perezida wa Reta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika Donald Trump yashikirije ku mugaragaro ko akeka ko Irani yihenze irakorora indege ya Ukraine itabizi.
Abategetsi ba Irani baracemeza ko iyo ndege yo mu bwoko bwa Boeing 737-800, yagize ikibazo c'ubuhinga mu gatondo ko ku musi wa gatatu. Ingenzi 176 zose zarimwo zarapfuye, harimwo n’abanyecanada 63.
Ariko amakuru ava muri Reta y’Amerika yabwiye Ijwi ry’Amerika ko abategetsi b’Amerika basuzumye amasanamu y’ikigendajuru ca Satelite, bemeza ko iyo ndege yarashwe na Misile yakorewe mu Burusiya igihaguruka i Teherani.
Reta za Ukraine na Canada ntizemera ibisobanuro vya Irani ko iyo ndege yagize ibibazo vy’ubuhinga.

U Rwanda rwafashe ingingo yo guca amande no kwugarira ivy’agatekanyo amahoteli, amazu y’uburiro n’ayo kwidagaduramwo atubahirije amategeko agenga kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’ikiza ca Covid-19.
Ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe iterambere, RDB, cahanishije ayo mazu ashika kuri 18 guhagarikwa ikiringo kiva ku kwezi kumwe gushika kuri atatu adakora hamwe n’amande ava ku 150,000 gushika ku 300,000 vy’amafaranga y’amanyarwanda.
Mu itangazo RDB isaba Abanyarwanda muri rusangi kurushiriza kwubahiriza amabwiriza yashizweho yo kwirinda ico kiza mu gihe bagendera bene ayo mazu yafatiwe ibihano.

Hasigaye ko akanama gashinzwe kwakira kandidatire kazisuzuma ubundi kakemeza niba bayemerewe.
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 15 Nyakanga 2017 ku isaha ya saa tanu nibwo akanama gashinzwe kwakira kanditatire z’abifuza kuyobora ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu matora ateganyijwe mu kwezi kwa Nzeri uyu mwaka kafunze imiryango yo kwakira kandidatire kubifuza kuyobora FERWAFA.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu ku mugoroba nibwo Vincent De Gaulle yashyikirije aka kanama kandidatire ye isaba kwiyamamariza uyu mwanya. Akaba yahise atangaza ko ashaka kureba niba Inteko rusange izongera kumugirira icyizere ikamutorera indi manda, ibyerekeranye n’imigabo n’imigambi akaba azabitangaza nyuma y’uko akanama gashinzwe amatora kamaze kwemeza kandidatire ye.
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ahagana saa tanu nibwo Mwanafunzi Albert wari usanzwe ashinzwe amarushanwa muri FERWAFA nawe yagejeje ubusabe kuri aka kanama gashinzwe amatora. Biravugwa ko we yaba yatanzwe n’ishyirahamwe riharanira impinduka mu mupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda.
Ubu nta yindi kandidatire yongera kwakirwa. Akanama nikamara gusuzuma niba aba bose bujuje ibisabwa kazahita kabitangaza. Ni mu gihe amatora ateganyijwe tariki ya 10 Nzeri 2017.

Igipolisi cyataye muri yombi Dr Kiiza Besigye uyobora ishyaka ritavuga rumwe na Leta FDC, kimubuza gukorana ikiganiro n’abanyamakuru bari bamushagaye.
Ikinyamakuru The Monitor cyandika ko abapolisi bagombye kumena ikirahure cy’imodoka uyu munyapolitiki wahoze mu gisirikare akaza kutavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi, bamuvanamo bamujyana ahantu hatazwi.
Iki kinyamakuru cyandika ko abarwanashyaka ba Besigye bakoze ibishoboka byose ngo iki kiganiro kibeho, ariko biba iby’ubusa.
Si iyi myigaragambyo yaburijemo inama y’ishyaka rya opposition muri Uganda, kuko abanyamakuru batari bake na bo batawe muri yombi barafungwa bazira kwigaragambya.
N’ubundi The Monitor yanditse ko aba banyamakuru binyuze mu ishyirahamwe ryabo ‘Uganda Journalists Association’ bakoze urugendo rwo kwamagana igipolisi ngo kuko kibabangamira iyo bari gukurikirana inkuru zirebana n’imyigaragambyo.
Aba banyamakuru batatanijwe banaterwa ibyuka biryana mu maso, ubwo bari mu muhanda wa Jinja berekeza Naguru ku kicyaro cya Polisi.
Baramagana bamwe mu bapolisi bakuru bakunze kuzonga itangazamakuru iyo riri muri aka kazi.

Muri iyi weekend ishize nibwo Mani Martin na Eddy Kenzo batangarije abafana babo ko barimo gusubiranamo indirimbo ‘Afro’.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Inyarwanda.com, Mani Martin yadutangarije ko iyi ndirimbo yitiriwe album ye ya 6, igiye gusuhoka mu minsi ya vuba mu buryo bwa ‘Remix’ yumvikanamo ijwi rya Eddy Kenzo ndetse imirimo ya nyuma (mastering) irimo gukorerwa muri Afrika y’Epfo.
Izasohoka mu gihe kidatinze kuko tuzabanza gusohora audi(amajwi), amashusho(video) yayo akazaza nyuma. Mani Martin
Eddy Kenzo umuhanzi w’Umugande ukunzwe hirya no hino muri Afrika, nawe yemeje aya makuru abinyujije mu mashusho(video) bifashe ari kumwe na Mani Martin aho yatangaje ko yishimiye kuba bagiye gukorana. Yagize ati “ Turi muri studio dukora Afro remix, nkunda iyi ndirimbo cyane, izaba ari indirimbo ikaze, uyu muhanzi(Mani Martin) ni umuhnazi mwiza, yaje kutureba atwereka ko afitiye umugabane wacu ikintu cyiza, ntewe ishema nawe ubu twarangije iyi ndirimbo, irasohoka vuba.”
Mani Martin akoranye na Eddy Kenzo, mu gihe kandi hari n’undi mushinga utarajya ahabona yakoranye na Sauti Sol mu kwezi kwa Gicurasi.

Uyu muhanda wangijwe n’ibiza byibasiye igihugu cyose kubera imvura nyinshi imaze iminsi igwa.
Mu itangazo yashyize ahagaragara ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 14 Gicurasi 2018, yavuze ko abashoferi bakwiye gukoresha uwa Kagitumba.
Iryo tangazo rigira riti “Polisi y’ u Rwanda irabamenyesha ko kubera ko umuhanda Gatuna -Gicumbi -Kigali mu Murenge wa cyumba, Akagali ka Rwankojo ukomeje kwangirika ubu amakamyo atemerewe kuwukoresha.
“Amakamyo ava Kigali cyangwa Uganda yakoresha umuhanda wa Kagitumba. Turasabwa kwihanganira izi mpinduka.”

Umuryango RPF urahamagarira Abanyarwanda bose kuzitabira ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza bya Perezida Kagame, umukandida wawo mu matora y’umukuru w’igihugu ateganyijwe ku ya 3 no ku ya 4 Kanama 2017.
Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa 12 Nyakanga, Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa RPF, Ngarambe Francois Xavier, yavuze ko Perezida Kagame azagera mu turere twose tw’igihugu, ndetse hakazaba utwo azajyamo inshuro ebyiri kubera imiterere yatwo.
Ati “ Umukandida wacu azagera mu turere twose tw’igihugu kandi kubera imiterere igoranye hari utwo azageramo kabiri. Ndasaba Abanyarwanda kuzaza ari benshi mu bikorwa byo kwiyamamaza.”
Ngarambe yavuze ko Perezida Kagame azatangira kwiyamamariza mu karere ka Ruhango ku wa Gatanu ku ya 14 Nyakanga 2017.
Yongeyeho ko muri ibyo bikorwa byo kwiyamamaza, Komiseri Gasamagera Wellars azaba ari we muvugizi w’ishyaka rya RPF Inkotanyi.

Muri Zimbabwe, Madzibaba Talent Matinya w’imyaka 25 ni umugabo wiyise umuhanuzi agasambanya umwana w’imyaka 12 inshuro 3 zose avuga ko ari kumuhanurira
Muri iki cyumweru, uwiyise umuhanuzi yatawe muri yombi azira gufata ku ngufu umwana muto, yari ashinzwe kwitaho, akamusambanya inshuro eshatu zose.
Madzibaba Talent Matinya w’imyaka 25 yatawe muri yombi ubwo yakoraga umurimo mu itorero ku rusengero rwa Johanne Masowe WeChishanu.
Bivugwa ko yasambanyije ku gahato umukobwa w’imyaka 12, abantu bakaba baratangiye kubikeka igihe umwe mu bavukana n’uwafashwe ku ngufu yabonaga ibaruwa y’urukundo yari yandikiwe uyu mwana.
Umuvugizi wa polisi, Komiseri wungirije mu gihugu cya Zimbabwe Paul Nyathi, yemeje ko uyu wiyitaga Umuhanuzi yatawe muri yombi.
Umuvugizi Wungirije, Nyathi yagize ati: “Polisi iri gukora iperereza ku kibazo cyo gufata ku ngufu gishinjwa uyu wiyitaga Umuhanzi”Umuyobozi wa polisi akaba yatangaje ko iperereza rigikomeje kandi ushinjwa akaba afungiye kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Macheke.

Ubworozi bw’amafi bugiye gukwiragizwa mu gihugu cose
mardi 10 Ndamukiza 2018, par
Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru kuri uwu wa mbere ariko ashikiriza ivyo ubushikiranganji arongoye bwaranguye mu mezi atatu ya mbere y’umwaka w’2018, umushikiranganji w’uburimyi n’ubworozi, Deo Guide RUREMA yamenyesheje ko imyiteguro y’ugukwiragiza mu gihugu cose iyo mivyaro y’amafi igeze kure, ko igisigare ari uburyo bucegeranwa.
"Dushaka gushikana inyanja z’amafi mu gihugu hagati, mu ntara zose, aha rero birasaba ko tuba twarondeye imivya y’amafi"
Tubibutse ko kuri uwu wa mbere ariho ubushikiranganji bw’uburimyi n’ubworozi bwatanguje isekeza ryo gucandaga ibitungwa bito bito, indwara y’akaranda, mu gihugu cose.

i kumva iyi ndirimbo, yumva aranezerewe cyane

Urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha ruhoraho, CPI mu magambo ahinnye y'Igifaransa, ruramagana ibihano Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika yafatiye abakozi barwo bakora anketi byaha by'intambara muri Afghanistani.
Mu itangazo yashyize ahagaragara, perezida w'inama rusange y'ibihugu bigize CPI, umucamanza O-Gon Kwon, avuga ko ibyemezo bya Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika "bibangamiye ubushake bwo kurwanya umuco wo kudahana no kuryoza ibyaha byabo abakora amahano ndengakamere."
Itangazo rirakomeza, riti: "Ibyemezo 
... 
burenganzira ku butabera no ku kuri."
Josep Borrell, umuyobozi w'urwego rushinzwe ububanyi n'amahanga rw'Umuryango w'ibihugu by'Ubulayi bwunze ubumwe, nawe yatangaje ko ibyemezo bya Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika "bihangayikishije cyane." Yavuze ko Ubulayi bushyigikiye CPI.
Umuryango mpuzamahanga uharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu. Human Rights Watch, watangaje ko "iki gitero kuri CPI kigamije kwima ubutabera abahohotewe bikabije muri Afghanistani, muri Israheli no muri Palestina. Ibihugu bishyigiki
...
ha ruhora, bashobora kuba bafite muri Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika. Ryemerera kandi Pompeo kubima uruhushya, viza, rwo kwinjira muri Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amwerika. Ariko ntirivuga uko bangana n'amazina yabo.
Guverinoma ya Perezida Trump ivuga ko CPI ari "urukiko rudashobora kwizerwa, rwamunzwe na ruswa kugera mu nzego zarwo zo hejuru." Ivuga kandi ko "Uburusiya bushobora kuba ari bwo buri inyuma y'anketi za CPI ku myitwarire y'abasilikali b'Amerika mu ntambara yo muri Afghanistani."

Umuhanzi Kizito Mihigo na Fondasiyo ye KMP (Kizito Mihigo pour la Paix) bakomeje ubukangurambaga bakora mu turere twose tw’igihugu, ku burere mboneragihugu.
Nyuma yo gusura uturere twa Rulindo, Gakenke, Nyabihu, Rubavu, Gicumbi, Gatsibo, Kirehe, Kayonza, Rwamagana, Ngoma, Nyagatare, Rusizi, Nyamasheke, Huye, Nyaruguru, Nyanza, Ruhango na Kamonyi, Kizito Mihigo aherekejwe na Fondation ye ku bufatanye na Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Amatora (NEC), basuye abaturage b’uturere twa Gasabo na Gisagara babatara
... 
 kwitegura amatora y’abadepite yo muri Nzeri 2013.
Mu karere ka Gasabo igitaramo cyabereye mu mujyi wa kabuga, naho mu karere ka Gisagara, igitaramo kibera mu kagari ka Nyaruteja, Umurenge wa Nyanza, hafi y’umupaka n’u Burundi.
Muri ibi bitaramo KMP ikorera mu turere twose tw’u Rwanda, Kizito Mihigo atumira bamwe mu bahanzi b’ibyamamare hano mu Rwanda mu njyana zitandukanye. Aha twavuga nka Sofiya Nzayisenga ucuranga inanga ya Kinyarwanda, Ama-G the Black ukunzwe cyane mu njyana ya Hip Hop ndets
...
niro “Umusanzu w’Umuhanzi” KMP icisha kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda buri wa kabiri i saa yine z’ijoro, Kizito Mihigo yavuze ko iyi gahunda y’ubukangurambaga ku burere mboneragihugu iri mu bikorwa bisanzwe by’iyi Foundation.
Kizito yavuze ko uyu muryango ayoboye, n’ubwo utegamiye kuri Leta, utazigera ushidikanya kugira ubufatanye na Leta mu bikorwa bifitiye inyungu Abanyarwanda, cyane cyane mu nzira y’Amahoro n’Ubwiyunge.
Ibi bitaramo bizakomereza mu turere twa Muhanga na Kicukiro.

Biratangaje Miss wa Ukraine yatangaje benshi ubwo yavugaga ukuntu yagiye ku rugamba atwite.
Anastasiia Lena wabaye Miss Ukraine mu 2015 yahishyuye ko ari kwitegura kwibaruka imfura ye nyuma y’igihe ari ku rugamba mu ntambara n’u Burusiya.
Uyu mukobwa uherutse gutungurana akigaba ku rugamba igihugu cye kiri kurwanamo n’u Burusiya, yongeye gutungura abamukurikira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga agaragaza ko yitegura kwibaruka.
Anastasia w’imyaka 31, ubwo u Burusiya bwateraga Ukraine ari mu ba mbere bafashe imbunda biyemeza kurwanirira igihugu cye.Inshuro nyinshi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga uyu mukobwa yakunze gusangiza abamukurikira amafoto ari ku rugamba.
Nyuma y’amezi umunani u Burusiya buteye Ukraine, uyu mukobwa yahishuye ko yarwanye urugamba atwite ndetse kuri ubu yitegura kwibaruka imfura ye.
Anastasiia yabaye Miss Ukraine mu 2015, uwo mwaka ahagararira igihugu cye mu irushanwa rya ‘Miss Grand International’, ndetse anitabira Miss Supranational 2016.

IGISOMWA CA MBEREIZABURIINKURU NZIZA
Ivyo dusoma mu gitabu ca Yobi (1, 6-22)
Umusi umwe, abana b'Imana baje gushengerera Umukama, shetani irarenguka na yo nyene iri kumwe n'abayo. Umukama abwira shetani ati: «Uvuye hehe?» Shetani imwishura iti: «Mvuye kugendagenda n'ugukwiragira kw'isi.» Umukama ayisubiza ati: «Mbega, witegereje umusavyi wanje Yobi? Nta n'umwe angana na we mu bantu bo kw'isi: ni umuntu w'ingingo n'ubutungane, ni umuntu yubaha Imana akirinda akabi.» Shetani ica imusubiza iti: «Mb
... 
mukozeko iminwe.» Shetani iraheza irasohoka, iva imbere y'Umukama. Umusi umwe, abahungu n'abakobwaba Yobi bariko barafungura, banywa n'imvinyu kwa mukuru wabo, intumwa iza kubwira Yobi iti: «Za mpfizi zawe zariko zirarima, na za ndogobwe zarisha ukwazo, ubwo nyene Abanyesheba baziguyemwo barazinyaga. Abasuku bawe na bo babamarira kw'icumu. Ni jewe musa nashoboye guhunga ngo nze kukubikira.»Uwo akivuga, uwundi aca arashika ati: «Umuriro w'Imana wakorotse uva mw'ijuru, uyigiza za ntama zawe n'abun
...
 banywa n'imvinyu mu nzu ya mukuru wabo, igihuhusi cavuye mu gahinga cihereza nya nzu mu mpande zose uko ari zine, isenyukira kuri rwa rwaruka ruhonerayo. Ni jewe musa nashoboye guhunga ngo nze kukubikira.» Yobi rero arahaguruka, atabura ivyambarwa vyiwe, ariharangura. Hanyuma agwa hasi, ariyubikira ati: «Navuye mu nda ya mama ata co mfise, nzosubirayo ntyo. Imana yari yangabiye, none yisubije. Izina ry'Imana nirininahazwe.» Muri ayo marushwa yose, Yobi ntiyacumuye kandi ntiyigeze atuka Imana.

Ubushikiranganji bw’amasoko ntanganguvu,ubutare n’agataka bumenyesha ko amafaranga yinjiye avuye mu gisata c’ubutare mu mwaka wa 2017 angana n’imiriyaridi 4.178.949.103 z’amafaranga y’amarundi mu gihe bategekanya kuronka imiriyaridi 3.
Mu kiganiro umushikiranganji w’amasoko ntanguvu,ubutare n’agataka Come MANIRAKIZA yaremesheje kur’uyu wa kabiri igenekerezo rya 13 Ruhuhuma 2017 igihe yashikiriza ivyaranguwe n’ubwo bushikiranganji mu mwaka wa 2017, yavuze ko ihangiro bari bihaye bayishitseko gushika ku bice 140 kw’ijana.
Umushikiranganji Come MANIRAKIZA yamenyesheje ko ubutare bwimbwe mu mwaka wa 2017 bwo mu bwoko bwa kasiterite,Wolframite,Coltan hamwe n’ubutare bita ko bucanze “Minerais mixte” bungana n’ibiro 726.245,25 ; hakaba hadandajwemwo ibiro 655.402,60.
Uwo mushikiranganji yamenyesheje ko ubutare bwo mu bwoko bw’inzahabu zimbwe zongera ziradandazwa zingana ibiro 1953,02813, mu gihe ubutare bwo mu bwoko bwa Terres rares bwimbwe bwongera buradandazwa mur’uwo mwaka bungana amatoni 50.
Come MANIRAKIZA,Umushikiranganji w’ubutare n’agataka
Umushikiranganji Come MANIRAKIZA yamenyesheje ko mu ntumbero yo kurwanya urudandazwa rwa magendu mu gisata c’ubutare, abantu 156 bimba ubutare batabifiye uburenganzira bafashwe hamwe n’ibikoresho vyakoreshwa.
Ubutare bucanze “Minerais mixte” bungana ibiro 1.077,4 nibwo bwafashwe mu mwaka wa 2017.

Neymar ntiyabonetse muri urwo rukino yari yakomeretse.

...
 muri PSG mu 2017, bamuguze ku giciro ca mbere kitari bwigere kibaho kw’isi c’imiriyoni 200 z’amapawundi.Kuva ashitse muri uno murwi yagiye ahura n’ikibazo c’imvune, mbere kuri we uno mwaka ukaba uherutse kurangira imbere y’igihe,azomara ikiringo kiri hagati y’amezi 3 na 4, ihiganwa rikazoba risigaje amezi 2 riragire.
PSG imaze gukoresha umuriyaridi urenga w’amapawundi, kuva igiye mu minwe y’abanya Qatar mu 2012. Imaze gutwara ihiganwa ry’Ubufaransa incuro cumi hamwe n’ibikombe 12 vyo mu gihugu.

Intambwe Uburundi bugezeko mu kunagura imigenderanire hagati y’abwo n’igihugu c’Urwanda ngo irashimishije. Umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburundi yabishikirije mw’ikoraniro kaminuza ry’umugambwe CNDD FDD riherutse kubera i Gitega.
Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ati : « je ndafise icizere gikomeye cane ko igihugu c’Urwanda, ejo tuzoba dukundana, kuko ubu twaramaze kubona ico dupfa, turakizi. Ni ukuvuga hirya y’ejo uzosanga tubazanya ngo none burya twapfa iki ? Karya gusa niko kaduteranije ? »
Umukuru w’igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye abona ko igisigaye ari uko igihugu c’Urwanda cokura mu nzira ico ivyo bihugu bipfa, ngo kubera ko gisanzwe caragiye ku mugaragaro. Yasiguye ko bitabereye ko bama bararyana kuko ngo basangiye vyinshi haba ururimi hamwe n’imico n’imigenzo.

Mu buryo bwatunguye abatari bake, ambassador Kanyamashuri wari umaze gusa amezi atandatu mu nteko ishinga amategeko y’u Rwanda yeguye ku kuba intumwabya rubanda mu nteko ishinga amategeko y’u Rwanda.

... 
a aya makuru yabitangaje, Amb. Kanyamashuri yanditse avuga ko ashingiye ku ngingo y’itegeko ngenga rigena imikorere y’umutwe w’abadepite, yeguye ku mpamvu ze bwite ku mwanya w’umudepite mu nteko ishinga amategeko y’u Rwanda.

...

Nk’uko bigaragara ku rutonde rw’abakandida Depite batanzwe n’umuryango RPF-Inkotanyi n’indi mitwe ya Politiki bafatanyije mu matora y’intumwa za rubanda yabaye muri Nzeli 2018, mu gihe haba nta gihindutse umwanya wa Amb. Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika irababajwe n’amajambo aheruka gushikirizwa n’umukuru w’igihugu c’uburundi Varisito Ndayishimiye aho yatangaje ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye bakwiye kwicishwa amabuye. Ivyo tubisanga mw’itangazo ryashizwe ahabona kuri uyu wa gatanu na Matthew Miller, umuvugizi w’ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu wa Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika.
«Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika ziratewe umutima uhagaze n’amajambo ya Perezida Ndayishimiye yibasira bamwe mu barundi bari mu buzima butari bwiza ndetse banakumiriwe mu kibano» Niko Matthew Miller, umuvugizi wa Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika yashikirije imbere y’abamenyeshamakuru.
Miller yarongeye agira ati :«Turahamagariye muri rusangi abategetsi b’i Burundi kwubahiriza uburenganzira n’agateka ka buri murundi wese ».
Tubamenyeshe ko kuwa 29 kigarama 2023 mu kiganiro yariko aha abamenyeshamakuru mu ntara ya Cankuzo, Perezida Varisito Ndayishimiye yariyamirije abo bahuza basangiye ibitsina aho yavuze ko vyari bikwiye ko umuntu afashwe yagirizwa ico caha yoshirwa ahabona abarundi bakamubona, bakamushira ku kibuga c’umupira maze bakamutera bose amabuye kuko ivyo bakora ngo ari «ibiterasoni».
Yagize ati :« Ndababwije ukuri, nimba ibihugu rutura birahatira ibihugu bikiri mu nzira y’iterambere kwemera umugenzi w’uko abasangiye ibitsina bobana, batavyemeye ko ata mfashanyo bazoronka, barayitwima! Twebwe ntidushobora kwemera iryo vumwe»

Cyera kabaye Iran yemeye ko yahaye ubufasha igihugu cy’Uburusiya
Ku nshuro ya mbere igihugu cya Iran cyemeye ko cyahaye U Burusiya indege zitagira abapilote bakunda kwita Drones icyakora iki gihugu kivuga ko ubu bufasha bwatanzwe mbere y’intambara iri hagati ya Ukraine n’Uburusiya.
Ibi byatangajwe na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Iran, witwa Hossein Amirabdollahian, gusa yavuze ko indege bahaye Uburusiya ngo zari nkeya cyane.
Uyu mugabo kandi yakomeje avuga ko nubwo bahaye Uburusiya izi ndege gusa ngo byakozwe mbere yo kuwa 24 Gashyantare 2022 mbere y’uko Uburusiya bushora intambara yeruye kuri Ukraine.
Gusa umukuru w’igihugu cya Ukraine bwana Volodymyr Zelensky we ashinja Iran kutavugisha ukuri aho avuga ko ingabo ze zihanura bene izi ndege zakorewe muri Iran zigera ku icumi buri munsi.
Iran bwa mbere yemeye ko yahaye igihugu cy’Uburusiya indege zitagira abapilote (Drones) ndetse Iran ikomeza ihamya ko ubu bufasha bwabayeho mbere y’intambara yo muri Ukraine.

...

Aba bantu batawe muri yombi tariki ya 4 Kanama 2016 nijoro nyuma yo kubasanga mu kabyiniro ahari hateguwe ibirori bihuza abatinganyi.
Uganda ni kimwe mu bihugu 37 byo ku mugabane wa Afurika bidashyigikira na gato ubutinganyi, aho benshi muri bo baba mu bwihisho ku bwo gutinya guhabwa akato no kubura imirimo yabo.
Clare Byaruhanga, umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira bw’abatinganyi muri Uganda yabwiye Reuters ko ku wa kane ahagana saa tanu n’igice z’ijoro aribwo polisi yinjiye mu kabyiniro gaherereye mu mujyi wa Kampala igatangira gukubita abantu no kubakuramo imyenda ishaka kureba niba ari abagabo cyangwa ari abagore.
Yakomeje avuga ko ibi birori byari gutorwamo Nyampinga na Rudasumbwa, byari kubimburira urugendo ruteganyijwe kuri uyu wa Gatandatu mu mujyi wa Kampala.
Abantu 15 batawe muri yombi bahise bajyanwa kuri sitasiyo ya polisi ariko nyuma y’amasaha abiri baza kurekurwa.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu gace ibi birori byari byabereyemo, Kayima Emilian, yavuze ko bahisemo kubihagarika kuko ababiteguye batari bigeze babimenyesha inzego z’umutekano kandi ko mu bigaragara bashakaga gushyigikira ubutinganyi kandi butemewe muri Uganda.
Mu ntangiriro za 2014 nibwo perezida Yoweri Museveni yasinye itegeko riha abatinganyi ibihano bikarishye birimo no kwicwa. Itegeko ritigeze ribvugwa rumwe n’ibihugu byo ku mugabane w’u Burayi na Amerika.
Nyuma ariko urukiko rushinzwe kurengera Itegeko Nshinga rwarikuyeho kubera ko hari zimwe mu ngingo zayo zitari zikoze neza.

Uganda: Bobi Wine yarashwe n'abapolisi
Umunyapolitiki Robert Ssentamu Kyagulanyi ’Bobi Wine’ utavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwa Uganda, kuri uyu wa Kabiri yarashwe na Polisi ya Uganda.
Ubutumwa bwanyujijwe ku rubuga rwa X rw’uyu munyapolitiki ukuriye ishyaka NUP buvuga ko yarasiwe akaguru ahitwa Bulindo.
Buragira buti: "Perezida wacu Bobi Wine yarasiwe akaguru na Polisi muri Bulindo. Yahise ajyanwa ikitaraganya kwa muganga kugira ngo yitabweho n’abaganga. Turakomeza kumenyesha igihugu amakuru y’uko ibintu byifashe".
Amashusho ari gukwirakwizwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga yerekana uyu munyapolitiki afite igikomere kidakanganye cyane ku kaguru.

Uru ni urupangu rw'aho abanyamakuru bakorera rwatewe n'abapolisi!
