Byemejwe na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Louise Mushikiwabo, mu kiganiro yagiranye n’itangazamakuru mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 14 Nyakanga 2015.
Yagize ati “Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa loni ategerejwe i Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatanu nimugoroba aho azahura na bamwe mu bayobozi b’Afurika bakaganira byihariye ku kibazo cya Sudani y’Amajyepfo.”
Byanashimangiwe n’Umuvugizi wa Loni, Stephane Dujarric, ubwo yatangazaga ko Ban Ki Moon ahaguruka i New York kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 14 Nyakanga 2016, agatangira uruzinduko agomba kugirira mu bihugu by’ Afurika bitatu, ari byo u Rwanda, Kenya n’Afurika y’epfo.
Ikibazo cy’intambara ibera muri Sudani y’Epfo ni kimwe mu bibazo bigomba gushakirwa umuti mu nama y’Afurika yunze Ubumwe iri kubera i Kigali ku nshuro yayo ya 27.
Biteganyijwe ko nyuma yo kuva mu Rwanda, Ban Ki Moon azerekeza muri Kenya i Nairobi mu nama ya 14 ya Loni ku bucuruzi n’iterambere, UNCTAD, nyuma y’aho akerekeza muri Afurika y’Epfo gutangiza Inama Mpuzamahanga ya 21 igamije kurwanya Sida.
Ban Ki Moon yaherukaga mu Rwanda muri Mata 2014 ubwo yari yaje kwifatanya n’Abanyarwanda kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.

Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga mu Rwanda yatangaje ko yakiriye aba bayobozi bahagarariye ibihugu byabo, kugira ngo baganire ku bufatanye hagati y’impande zombi, ibibazo by’Akarere no ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
U Rwanda rufite ubufatanye n’umubano mwiza n’ibindi bihugu, haba ku mugabane w’Afurika ndetse no ku yindi migabane.
Uretse Repuburika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC), yanze gukemura ikibazo cy’umutekano mucye wo mu burasirazuba bw’iki gihugu, no kubahiriza amasezerano ya Luanda na Nairobi, ibindi bihugu byo ku mugabane w’Afurika cyane ibigize EAC, bishyigikiye ko ikibazo cy’umutekano mucye urangwa muri RDC cyakemuka mu mahoro.
U Rwanda rumaze igihe rusaba amahanga kubwira DRC ko ibibazo ifite ari ibyayo, ko nta gihugu ikwiriye kubyegekaho kandi ko igisubizo cy’umutekano mucye, kizava ku bayobozi b’icyo gihugu.
U Rwanda kandi rugira imikoranire myiza n’amahanga haba mu bijyanye n’uburezi, ubuvuzi, umutekano, ikoranabuhanga, ndetse n’ishoramari.
Kubera umubano mwiza u Rwanda rufitanye n’ibindi bihugu ndetse n’amahanga, rwagiriwe icyizere ruhabwa kuyobora Commonwealth ndetse n’umuryango w’ibihugu bikoresha ururimi rw’amahanga.

“Umurwi Musongati Fc niwo murwi wama wangoye cane ndawusezeye nzoba ntwaye igikombe c’umukuru w’igihugu .”
Ivyo bikaba vyarashikirijwe n’umunyamabanga mukuru w’umurwi Bumamuru Fc Niyonsaba Jean Paul inyuma yo gutahukana igikombe ca Primus League 2022-2023 .
Akaba yagize ati: ’’ Nari nababwiye ko Primus League itazova i Buganda, ndibazako nabivuze kuva mu nkino zo gutangura ( Fase Aller) muravyibuka ko nabibababariye , kuko nabona ko imyiteguro ihari y’abarongoye imirwi ihagije kandi abarongozi twakorana neza tukayaga neza kandi tugahuza , nico gituma nari mfise icizere co gutwara igikombe ‘’
‘’ Igikombe c’Umukuru w’igihugu naho nyene Imana ibishatse dushobora kugitwara , kuko mu gikombe c’Umukuru w’igihugu urukino tubona ko rwotugora gato ni urwa Musongati Fc naho nyene tuzokina ariko tuyirenganye muzoce mumenya ko nico gikombe kizoca kija i Buganda .
Mwomenyako urukino rwo gutangura rw’igice 1/2 gishira icanyuma c’igikombe c’Umukuru w’igihugu umurwi Musongati Fc waraye wakiriye Bumamuru Fc urukino rurangira imirwi yose inganije 0-0 , mugihe kurundi ruhande umurwi wa Aigle Noir Cs waraye unganije na Vital’o Fc igitsindo 1-1.

Ikipe ya Chelsea isanzwe ikina shampiyona y’ikiciro cya mbere mu gihugu cy’u Bwongereza ishobora kuva gukinira kuri Stamford Bridge ikaba yakwerekeza ku kindi kibuga.
Ikipe ya Chelsea isanzwe yakirira imikino yayo kuri Sitade yitwa Stamford Bridge, ariko iyi Sitade ikaba ari ntoya ugereranyije n’andi masitade y’amakipe atandukanye mu Bwongereza kuko Stamford Bridge yakira abafana ibihumbi 40341.
Mu mavugurura ubuyobozi bwa Chelsea buri gukora, bamaze gushyiramo umushinga wo kuvugurura iyi sitade kuburyo yakakira abantu benshi nayo ikajya mu masitade manini nka Wembley stadium, Old Trafford ya Manchester United cyangwa Tottenham Hotspurs Stadium n’ayo y’i London.
Ubuyobizi bwa Chelsea burashaka ko Stamford Bridge yatangiye gukoreshwa na Chelsea mu 1905 yakongera imyanya yo kwicaraho, ikaba yagera ku bantu ibihumbi 60 bicaye Chelsea ku girango ibi binozwe byazayitwara agera kuri miliyari 2 z’amapawundi.
Mu gihe iyi sitade ya Stamford Bridge yatangira kubakwa byazatwara imyaka 4 Chelsea idakinira kuri sitade yayo, aho bishoboka ko ishobora kwerekeza ku kibuga cya Fulham Craven Cottage, Olympic London Stadium cyangwa Wembley sitade y’u Bwongereza.

Umukinnyikazi wa film Isimbi alliance aratangaza ko yiyamye ikinyamakuru Rwanda paparrazi , nyuma yuko iki kinyamakuru cyanditse inkuru ivuga ko cyahuje uyu mukobwa nu mugabo kandi bagiye gushinga urugo.
Isimbi umwe mubakobwa bahagaze neza muri cinema nyarwanda ,akaba yaramenyekanye muri film yakunzwe cyane yitwa “Rwasa”.ubu akaba ari gukina muri film yitwa “rwasibo”.
Mumakuru amaze iminsi avugwa kuruyu mukobwa yavugaga ko uyu mukobwa ari kwitegura gushinga urugo n’umukunzi we ngo baba barahujwe nikinyamakuru cyitwa rwandapaparrazi gikorera kuri internet.
Gusa nyuma yuko bikomeje kuvugwa ntabwo byashimije uyu mukobwa kuko we atangaza ko ibyo ari ibinyoma byahimbwe n’abanyamakuru biki kinyamakuru.
Mumagambo ye yagize ati”ibyo nukubeshya pee kuko jye umukunzi mfite tumaranye igihe kandi tujya kumenyana nta muntu numwe waduhuje kandi nta nuwa bigizemo uruhare.”
Twakomeje tumubaza icyo we acyeka cyaba cyaratumye bavuga ibi ,maze adusubiza ko we abona ibyo ntamwanya yabiha .mumagambo ye yaguze ati ”rwose sinzi aho babikuye pee kuko jye sinzi nimba icyo kinyamakuru gitanga abagabo,ahubwo umenya arabasazi”.

Smart Burundi yabazaniye uturusho ibicishije muri DUTCHATTER
Tuesday 13 February 2018, by
Murashaka kuyaga n’abagenzi bashasha mukaganira mw’isanzuye? Smart Burundi, ibicishije ku buhinga DUTCHATTER,irorohereza abanywanyi mu guhamagarana n’incuti n’abagenzi, Ku mafaranga ijana gusa ( 100fr) ku munsi, canke mugakoresha amafaranga amajana ane (400fr) ku ndwi yose, iyandikishe mwironkere abagenzi n’incuti bashasha.
Mu kwiyandikisha, muca kuri *810#Ok hanyuma muhitemwo 1 .Ubwo buhinga bukaba budacagura, umunywanyi wa Smart wese araburekuriwe, uwufise terefone ntoyi imwe bita «agahinda», canke uwufise terefone nini imwe bakunze kwita «Ibitabo».
Smart Burundi ntakwo itagira mu kworohereza abanywanyi. Orosha ubuzima n’umuhora ubitayeho vyukuri. Smart, Let’s talk.

Mw-ijoro ryo kuruwu wa gatandatu ushira umusi w-Imana niho hatangura gucanako amasanamu yerekana iruka ry-ikirunga Nyiragongo aho mu kirere hose h-umuji wa Goma haciye hasa n-ibara ry-umucungwe.
Ibihumbi n-ibihumbi vy-abanye Goma baciye batangura guhungana n-utwabo bamwe berekeza mu burasirazuba neza na neza k-umupaka uhana urubibe n-igihugu ca congo hamwe n-u Rwanda. Ariko abari bahunze nka bose kuva mu gatondo ko kuruwu w-Imana batanguye gusubira mu mihana iwabo inyuma yaho ico kirunga gihagaritse kuruka mw-ijoro ryakeye.
Tubibutse ko ico kirunga ca Nyiragongo caheruka guturika bikomeye mu mwaka w-2002 aho cononye ibintu vyishi hagapfa abantu 250, abandi bagera ku 120.000 basigara bifumbereje ata kintu bafise bikorako ndetse batagira naho baba.

Perezida wa Sudani y’Epfo, Salva Kiir Mayardit, yatangaje ko yahinze umushyitsi ubwo Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku isi, Papa Francis w’imyaka 82 y’amavuko, yasomaga ibirenge bye basoje umwiherero w’iminsi ibiri waberega i Vatican.
Perezida Kiir yavuze ko umwiherero w’iminsi ibiri yakoreye i Vatican ari
Mu butumwa yatanze ku munsi wo kwizihiza izuka rya Yesu/Yezu (Pasika),
Perezida wa Sudani y’Epfo, Kiir yavuze ko uruzinduko w’iminsi ibiri yakoreye i
Vatican ruzifashishwa mu guharanira kugarura amahoro, kunga ubumwe no kugira

Perezida Kiir yavuze ko yahinze umushyitsi ubwo Papa Francis yasomaga ibirenge bye
Kiir kandi yaboneyeho gusaba uwahoze ari Visi-Perezida we Dr Riek Machar kugaruka i Juba ‘byihutirwa’ kugira ngo bashakire hamwe umuti w’amahoro arambye. Ati “Kuri uyu munsi twizihizaho Pasika nk’abayobozi banyu turi gukorera hamwe mu kuzana amahoro mu gihugu. Ntabwo twacyererewe. Ndatumira Dr Riek Machar ‘byihutirwa’ kugaruka i Juba kugira ngo dukorere hamwe mu gushakisha umuti w’amahoro no gushyiraho Guverinoma yunze ubumwe.”
Papa Francis asanzwe afite uburwayi bwo mu kaguru, kuya 11 Mata 2019, yasabye abari aho kumufasha agaca bugufi maze asoma inkweto z’abayobozi bo muri Sudani y’Amajyepfo. Perezida Kiir n’uwahoze ari Visi-Perezida we, bavuye i Vitican bemeranyije na Papa Francis kudasubira mu ntambara ahubwo bagashyiraho Leta y’ubumwe.
Papa Francis yasomye ibirenge bya Visi-Perezida wa Sudani y'Epfo, Taban.

Ikibazo : Ingabire yo kuvuga mu ndimi zitamenyekana ni iki?
Inyishu : Ahantu ha mbere tubona abantu bavuze mu zindi dimi zitamenyekana ni ku musi wa pentekote mu Vyakozwe n’Intumwa 2:1-4. Intumwa zarasohotse, zibwira ishengero ryari aho Ijambo ry’Imana, zibabwira mu ndimi zabo: “Tukabumva bavuga mu ndimi zacu ibitangaza vy’Imana!” (Ivyakozwe n’Intumwa 2:11). Ijambo ry’Ikigiriki risobanuwemwo indimi zitamenyekana risobanura “indimi zitandukanye.”

Urukiko rwo mu murwa mukuru wa Uganda, Kampala, rwarekuye by’agateganyo umwanditsi Kakwenza Rukirabashaija wari ufunzwe kuva mu mpera z’Ukuboza 2021.
Kakwenza Rukirabashaija ntiyemerewe kujya hanze y’igihugu kandi agomba guha urukiko urwandiko rwe rw’inzira (passport) rukarubika mu gihe cy’amezi atandatu.
Ntiyemerewe kandi kuba yavuga ku mugaragaro ku rubanza rwe.
Uyu mwanditsi yari yafunzwe kuva mu mpera y’ukwezi k’Ukuboza 2021, ni mu gihe muri uku kwezi kwa mbere urukiko rwari rwategetse ko akomeza gufungwa.
Mu cyumweru gishize, abunganizi be mu mategeko bari basabye ko arekurwa, bavuga ko ubuzima bwe butameze neza.
Rukirabashaija aregwa ibyaha bibiri byo gukoresha imvugo ikomeretsa – biteganywa n’itegeko ku gukoresha nabi mudasobwa – mu kubangamira amahoro ya Perezida Yoweri Museveni n’umuhungu we Liyetona Jenerali Muhoozi Kainerugaba, umugaba mukuru w’ingabo zirwanira ku butaka.

Lt Colonel Kayumba wigeze no kuvugwa mu buyobozi bwa APR FC niwe watorewe kuyobora ishyirahamwe ry’imikino ngororamubiri mu Rwanda.
Kuri uyu wa gatandatu taliki ya 22 Mutarama abanyamuryango bagize ishyirahamwe ry’imikino ngororamubiri baraye bitoreye komite nshya izayobora iryo shyirahamwe mu gihe cy’imyaka ine iri imbere, muri ayo matora yabaye mu ituze, hatowe Lt Col (Rtd) KAYUMBA Lemuel, ni ibintu n’ubundi bitatunguranye cyane ko ari nawe mukandida rukumbi wiyamamarizaga kuri uno mwanya, umugabo yigeze kuba umunyamabanga mukuru w’ikipe ya APR FC mu myaka yashize.
Mu ijambo rye, Bwana KAYUMBA yavuze ko ashimishijwe n’icyizere yagiriwe ndetse avuga ko atari mushya muri ino mikino nk’uko benshi babikekaga, yavuze ko yigeze no kuyobora ikipe ya APR mu mikino yo kwiruka hagati y’imyaka ya 2004 na 2008 bityo ko abantu bakwiye kwizera ubunyamwuga bwe, ndetse n’uburambe mubyo agiyemo.
Bwana Kayumba azaba yumgirijwe n’abantu batatu aribo Bigirimana Anastase ushinzwe gahunda n’ubufatanye, Bwana Ndekezi Olivier nawe ni umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe amarushanwa n’iterambere, mu gihe Ntabana Ange Dorianne ashinzwe imali n’imiyoborere (DAF).

Ikipe ya Atletico Madrid yemeye gutandukana na rutahizamu wayo Diego Costa nyuma y'ubusabe uyu mukinnyi yari yagejeje kuri iyi kipe.
Atletico Madrid yatangaje ko yamaze kumvikana na Diego Costa ko basesa amasezerano ndetse bakazamureka akagenda muri Mutarama 2021 dore ko uyu mukinnyi yari yanze kwitabira imyitozo mu minsi ishize. Umwaka wa 2020 ntabwo wagendekeye neza uyu rutahizamu w'imyaka 32 nyuma yo kugira ikibazo cy'imvune cyatumye amara amezi hanze y'ikibuga, kandi nyuma yaho yaje kurwara Coronavirus nabyo byatumye atabona imikino ihagije.

Ikipe ya AS Kigali yari ihagarariye u Rwanda mu irushanwa rya CAF Confederations Cup yasezerewe mu ijonjora rya kabiri ry’iyi mikino na Proline FC yo muri Uganda yayitsinze ibitego 2-1 mu mukino wo kwishyura wabereye kuri Lugogo Stadium.
AS Kigali yakoze amakosa mu mukino ubanza ikanganyiriza I Kigali igitego 1-1 na Proline FC,yageze muri Uganda ihatsindirwa ibitego 2-1 bituma inzozi zayo zo kugera mu matsinda ya CAF Confederations Cup ziyoyoka.
Ikipe ya AS Kigali yitwaye nabi mu gice cya mbere cy’umukino kuko aricyo yatsindiwemo ibi bitego 2 byombi byatsinzwe na Ivan Bogere ku munota wa 12 n’uwa 21 bituma amahirwe yo gukomeza ayoyoka.
AS Kigali yagerageje kureba ko yakwishyura ngo isezerere iyi kipe yo muri Uganda ariko biba iby’ubusa gusa ku munota wa 85 yishyuyemo igitego kimwe cya faruk Ruhinda.
AS Kigali yasezerewe ku kinyuranyo cy’ibitego 3-2 mu mikino yombi, igomba kugaruka mu Rwanda vuba na bwangu kuko kuwa kabiri w’icyumweru gitaha ifitanye umukino na Rayon Sports mu guhatanira igikombe cya Super Cup gihuza ikipe yatwaye shampiyona n’iyatwaye igikombe cy’Amahoro.
Abakinnyi ba AS Kigali ntibabashije kuyigeza mu cyiciro cya nyuma cyo kwerekeza mu matsinda

Jacques Tuyisenge bivugwa ko yifuzwa na APR yasezeye Petro Atletic yo muri Angola
Rutahizamu w’Umunyarwanda wakinaga muri Angola witwa Jacques Tuyisenge yasezeye mu ikipe ye yakiniraga muri yitwa Petro Atletico De Luanda, nyuma yo kumara umwaka umwe ayikinira.
Abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter, yasezeye abakinnyi, abakunzi ndetse n’abayobozi b’iyi kipe yakiniraga, aho yari asigaje umwaka umwe w’imikino, mu myaka ibiri yari yarasinye.
Yagize ati: “Nishimiye cyane ibihe byiza nagiriye mu muryango mugari wa Petro Atletico n’ibihe byiza nagiriye aha. Mwarakoze cyane kumpa amahirwe yo kugera kubyo nagezeho ndi hano. Ndabifuriza ibyiza mu rugendo rwanyu.”
Jacques Tuyisenge yageze muri Petro Atletic De Luanda mu mwaka ushize w’imikino wa 2019/2020, aho yari asigaje umwaka umwe w’imikino wa 2020/2021, icyo gihe yari avuye muri Gormahia afite ibitego byinshi muri Kenya.
Jacques Tuyisenge yavuye mu Rwanda muri 2015 mu ikipe ya Police Fc ahita yerekeza muri Gor Mahia yo muri Kenya aho nawe yamazeyo imyaka ine. Uyu musore yahise yerekeza mu ikipe ya Petro Atletic De Luanda.
Tuyisenge yasezeye muri iyi kipe nubwo ataravuga indi azerekezamo
Jacques yasezeye ikipe yakiniraga

Umukinnyi w’ikipe y’igihugu ya Misiri na Liverpool yo mu Bwongereza byasabye abasirikare kugira abashe gusohoka mu kibuga nyuma y’uko batsinze Sierra Leone ibitego 2-0.
Imikino yo gushaka itike y’igikombe cy’Isi cya 2026 ku makipe y’ibihugu yo muri Afurika irakomeje.
Ku munsi w’ejo Saa Kumi n’Ebyiri mu itsinda A nibwo Sierra Leone yari yakiriye Misiri kuri sitade yo muri Liberia ya Samuel Kanyon Stadium , byarangiye Misiri ariyo itsinze ibitego 2-0. Ibi ni ibitego byose byatsinzwe na Trezeguet ku mipira yabaga yahawe na Mohammed Salah.
Bigeze ku munota wa 89 w’umukino abafana batangiye kwinijira mu kibuga bashaka Mohamed Salah.
Umufana wambere wari wambaye umwambaro wa Liverpool yinjiye mu kibuga aragenda afata amagaru y’uyu mukinnyi mu buryo bwashoboraga gutuma yikubita hasi ariko abashinzwe umutekano bahise bamugeraho baramufata bamusohora nabi.
Nyuma akavuyo k’abafana kakomeje binjira mu kibuga bose bashaka Mohammed Salah ariko abashinzwe umutekano bakaba babagezeho hakirikare arinako babasohora nabi.
Kugira ngo ajye mu rwambariro abasirikare bahise bajya mu kibuga bamusohora bamurinze ibintu bidasanzwe mu mu mupira w’amaguru.

P.Claver Mbonimpa yarekuwe vy'agateganyo
Pierre Claver Mbonimpa arongoye APRODH, rimwe mu mashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi yarekuwe vy'agateganyo na sentare nkuru ya Bujumbura.
Ariko ntarekuriwe kurenga igisagara ca Bujumbura adafise uruhusha rw'igipolisi.
Umukobwa wiwe Amandine Nasasagare ati: ''Umunezero ni ntangere, twebwe n'aho ari ivy'agateganyo, turabishima, turanezerewe ko tuzorwaza uwacu atawuduhagaze hejuru''
Yari mu munyoro kuva hagati mu kwezi kwa gatanu yagirizwa guhungabanya umutekano w'UBurundi imbere no hanze y'igihugu.
Mbonimpa , w'imyaka 65, amaze hafi ukwezi mu bitaro kubera indwara zitandukanye harimwo diabete n'umutima.
Kuva agifatwa abashingwamanza biwe bagumye bsaba ko arekurwa ku mvo z'amagara n'imyaka afise.
Sentare nkuru ya Bujummbura ku wa gatanu niho yaronka icegeranyo c'abaganga bagenywe kwihweza amagara yiwe ingene yifashe aho arwariye mu bitaro Bumerec, basanga araremvye koko.
Urubanza rwaciye ruja mu mwiherero.
Umukuru wa APRODH yafashwe imyuma yo kuvugira ku maradiyo ko hari urwaruka rw'abarundi ruhabwa imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare mu gihugu kibanyi ca Congo. yavuze ko muri urwi hari n'abamaze gusigayo ubuzima. Ivyo leta y'Uburundi ikaba yarabibeshuje.
Umushikirizamanza yavuze ko mu vyemezo Pierre Claver Mbonimpa yerekanye hari amafoto atari yo.
Amakungu harimo ibihugu vya Bulaya na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yari agize igihe asaba ko Pierre Claver Mbomimpa arekurwa.

Umupolisi wo ku kirindiro c’i Makamba yarafashwe n’abanyezamu mu ntara ya Gitega mu kigo c’abana b’impfuvyi FVS-Gitega, yashaka kwiba ngaho hantu kuko yari yasimvye urugo yinjira indani. Abanyagihugu barahatswe kumwica iyo Imana idakinga.
Uwo mupolisi yitwa Celestin Sabokwigura. Abanyezamu bamufashe baciye bamubohera ku giti c’amatara. Abantu bahita baguma bamuraba ariko nawe akagerageza kunyegeza mu maso kugira ntibamumenye ko ari umupolisi w’igihugu naho yari atambaye impuzu z’akazi. Abo banya
... 
haka kumwica babanje kumukubita.
Nk’uko abanyezamu bo mu kigo c’abana b’impfuvyi FVS i Gitega bamufashe babivuga, ngo uwo mupolisi yari yambaye impuzu zo kwinonora imitsi hanyuma yurira urugo asimbira indani muri ico kigo. Bamubonye ngo yaciye yiruka ariko abanyezamu barashoboye kumufata.
Abajejwe igipolisi n’intwaro ngo nibo bashoboye kumumenya ko ari umupolisi w’igihugu akorera ku kirindiro c’i Makamba. Ngo yari yarataye akazi haraheze ukwezi kwose. Uwo mupolisi wewe arahakana ko atari aje kwi
...
ha ko yari yaje kwivuza aho i Gitega ariko abayoboye igipolisi bamenyesha ko atavyo bari bazi kandi bategerezwa kubimenya. Yaviye ajanwa gufungwa kugira hakorwe amatohoza.
Hussein Butoyi arongoye zone Nyamugari aho uwo mupolisi yafatiwe amenyesha ko ubusuma busigaye ari bwinshi. Ngo hari abaza gusahura abanyagihugu biyita ko ari abakozi bo mu rwego rw’ipererza kandi atari vyo.
Abanyagihugu basaba ko uwufashwe yagirizwa ubusuma yohanwa hisunzwe amategeko kuburyo n’abandi bafise ako gatima baheba.

Icyamamare mu myidagaduro Zari Hussein wiyita Bosslady wamenyekanye ubwo yari umugore wa Diamond Platnumz bakabyarana abana babiri,yatangaje ko ameze neza cyane mu ngeri zose ndetse no ku bijyanye no gutera akabariro.
Zari abinyujije kuri Snapchat yatangaje ko aryohewe no gutera akabariro n’umukunzi we mushya akunda kwita ‘King Bae’ ariko atarerekana isura.
Mu minsi ishize nibwo Zari yerekanye impano y’inzu nziza yahawe n’umukunzi we mushya, nubwo abafana ba Diamond bamwibasiye bavuga ko ari ikinyoma cya semuhanuka.
Zari yashyize kuri SnapChat ye ifoto yambaye nk’uvuye mu myitozo ngororamubiri ayiherekeza amagambo ashimangira ko yishimiye umubyibuho asigaye afite.
Yagize ati “Abana bafite ubuzima bwiza, Ibyokurya byiza,imibonano mpuzabitsina iryoshye, amafaranga kuri banki n’amahoro y’umutima. Ibi byose nibyo biri gutuma mbyibuha.”
Zari yemeje ko aryohewe no gutera akabariro n’umukunzi we mushya

Urukiko Rwisumbuye rwa Nyarugenge rwasubitse isomwa ry’urubanza ruregwamo abantu 19 barimo Umuyobozi Mukuru wa IPRC Kigali, Eng. Mulindahabi Diogène bakurikiranyweho ibyaha by’ubujura bw’ibikoresho by’ishuri.
Isomwa ry’uru rubanza ryari riteganyijwe kuri uyu wa 17 Mutarama 2023, saa cyenda z’umugoroba ariko riza gusubikwa hashingiwe ku kuba isesengurwa ryarwo ritarasozwa kubera ubwinshi bw’ababuranyi.
Uru rubanza ruregwamo abari abayobozi bakuru ba IPRC Kigali ndetse na bamwe mu bakozi bivugwa k
... 
2023, Nabo Jean Claude, wari ushinzwe kubika ibikoresho, uri mu bakurikiranwe bafungiwe muri Gereza ya Mageragere, yagaragaje ko batari bakwiye kuba bafunzwe mu gihe abandi bareganwa bakurikiranwe bari hanze.
Bagenzi be bafunganywe kubera iyi dosiye na bo bavuga ko bari bahawe akazi na bamwe muri aba bayobozi, bityo ko batari bakwiye kuba bafunze ababahaye akazi badafunzwe, bagasaba kurekurwa bagakurikiranwa bari hanze nk’abandi.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko ubushinjacyaha na bwo bwajuririye icyemezo 
...
ndahabi Diogene, Hakizimana Venuste, Muhimpundu Vander Thomas n’abandi ahubwo rugategeka ko bakurikiranwa bafunzwe.
Mu iburanisha ku ifungwa n’ifungurwa ry’agateganyo, Ubushinjacyaha bwavuze ko ibikoresho bashinjwa kwiba bifite agaciro k’asaga miliyoni 113Frw.
Bugaragaza ko hatwawe ibikoresho birimo indobo z’amarangi, inzugi n’amadirishya by’ibyuma, utubati dukorerwa muri IPRC, insinga, imashini n’ibindi bitandukanye.
Isomwa ry’uru rubanza ryimuriwe ku wa 23 Mutarama 2023 saa cyenda z’umugoroba.

Umukuru w’igihugu c’uburundi Varisito Ndayishimiye asanzwe iki gihe ari nawe arongoye umuryango w’ibihugu vya Afrika y’ubuseruko , yakoranye ibiganiro kuri terefone n’abagenzi we barongoye ibihugu bigize uwo muryango, mu ntumbero yo kuraba ingene ikibazo c’umutekano muke muri Republika iharanira intwaro rusangi ya Congo cotorerwa umuti.
Nkuko tubisoma mw’itangazo ryasohowe n’ibiro vya perezida w’uburundi kuri uyu wa kabiri, Abakuru b’ibisirikare vy’ibihugu biri muri EAC , vuba bagiye guhurira mu nama kugira bige ku kibazo c’umutekano muke uri muri Congo.
Iryo tangazo ritomora ko inyuma y’inama y’abatwara ibisirikare vya EAC , Abarongoye ibihugu bigize uwo muryango bapfunditseko nabo bazoca bakorana mu nama idasanzwe yiga ku kibazo ca Congo. Akaba ata musi watanzwe nyezina iyo nama izobera.
Tubamenyeshe Perezida Ndayishimiye arongoye EAC iki gihe agiranye ikiganiro n’abagenzi we ba EAC ku kibazo ca Congo inyuma yahoo umuhari M23 ukomereje imirwano hagati y’igisirikare ca Leta hamwe n’uwo muhari, biwutuma wigarurira uburere bwinshi harimwo n’uko uriko werekeza mu gisagara ca Goma. Leta ya Congo yagiriza igihugu c’urwanda kuba kiriko gishigikira umuhari M23 nayo Urwanda narwo rukabihakana rwivuye inyuma ahubwo narwo rukagiriza Leta ya Congo kuba iriko ikoresha umuhari FDLR mu gushaka guhungabanya umutekano mu Rwanda, ivyo na Leta ya Congo yagiye yamirira kure ko ikorana n’uwo muhari wagirizwa gukora ihonyabwoko ry’abatutsi mu Rwanda mu mwaka wa 1994.

Mu minsi ya vuba, Amama Mbabazi wahoze ari Minisitiri w’Intebe muri Uganda araba bamwana wa Cyril Ramaphosa, umuyobozi mushya wa repubulika y’Afurika y’Epfo nyuma y’uko abana babo bashakanye bakabana nk’umugore n’umugabo.
Chimpreports dukesha iyi nkuru ivuga ko umuryango wa Amama Mbabazi watangaje ko mu mpera z’iki cyumweru, mwishywa wa Amama Mbabazi witwa Bridget Birungi Rwakairu yafataga nk’umukobwa we kuko ari we wamureze kuva ari uruhinja nyuma y’urupfu rwa se mu myaka mirongo ishize, azasabwa akanakobwa n’umuhungu wa Cyril Ramaphosa witwa Andile Ramaphosa imihango yo gusaba ikazabera mu rugo rwa Amama Mbabazi.
Birungi Rwakairu w’imyaka 36 y’amavuko yarerewe mu rugo rwa Amama Mbabazi nyuma y’uko se umubyara, Shadrack Rwakairu yishwe n’abagizi ba nabi mu 1983 hamwe n’umugore we Peace Ruhindi bari bamaranye imyaka 5 gusa bashakanye.
Amama Mbabazi yatangaje ko we n’umugore we bagiye gukorera umukobwa wabo ibirori ku itariki ya 19 uku kwezi mu busitani bw’aho atuye mu gace ka Kololo.
Uyu mukobwa afite impamyabumenyi yakuye muri kaminuza ya Beijing University mu bijyanye n’Ubumenyi n’ikoranabuhanga, iy’ubwenjinyeri mu bijyanye n’ibidukikije yakuye muri kaminuza ya Beijing Jiaotong University .
Indi mihango injyanye no gusezerana imbere y’Imana no mu mategeko nayo iteganyijwe muri uyu mwaka, uyu mukobwa akajyanwa muri Afurika y’Epfo mu rugo rwa Perezida.

Nyuma y’aho ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu bisohoreye itangazo ry’ishyirwaho rya minisitiri mushya w’intebe Bwana Edouard NGIRENTE, ashyizweho na Perezida wa Repubulika Nyakubahwa Paul KAGAME, nk’uko itegekoshinga ry’ U Rwanda ribiteganya, kuri uyu mugoroba mu ngoro y’inteko ishingamategeko y’URwanda hamaze kubera umuhango wo kwakira indahiro y’uwo muyobozi mushya.
Mu ijambo rye yakira indahiro ya minisitiri w’intebe mushya, Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika yashimiye minisitiri w’intebe ucyuye igihe Bwana Anasthase MUREKEZI anashimira ndetse anakira Bwana Edouard NGIRENTE minisitiri mushya w’intebe w’URwanda.
Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika kandi yakomeje ashimangira ko mu gihe gito cyane ku bufatanye na minisitiri mushya w’intebe haza gutangazwa urutonde rw’abaminisitiri bagiye kugira guverinoma nshya. Aho ngo iza kuba igizwe na bamwe mu bari bayisanzwemo ndetse n’abashya, ariko mu ishirwaho ryayo na none hakagenderwa ku mahame n’ubundi leta y’URwanda isanzwe igenderaho nk’iry’uburinganire ndetse n’isaranganya ry’imitwe ya politique.
Minisitiri w’intebe w’URwanda Bwana Edouard NGIRENTE ni inzobere mu by’ubukungu, akaba yari asanzwe ari umukozi wa Banki y’isi, aho yari afite umwanya w’ Umujyanama Mukuru w’Umuyobozi Nshingwabikorwa wa Banki y’Isi (Senior Advisor To Executive Director of World Bank).

Mu gitondo cyo ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 20 Mata 2018, nibwo inkuru y’isezera ry’uyu mutoza yamenyekanye na Polisi y’Igihugu ibicishije ku rubuga rwayo rwa Twitter, yemeza ko we n’awo bari bafatanyije basezeye.
Seninga asezeye ku butoza bwa Police FC atabashije kuyihesha igikombe na kimwe, byongeye anayisize ku mwanya wa munani muri shampiyona ku rutonde rw’agateganyo.
Amakuru atandukanye aturuka mu bakunzi ba ruhago nyarwanda n’ab’ikipe ya Polisi FC avuga ko uyu mutoza Seninga yari yahawe umukino wa Mukura VS kugira ngo awutsinde kugira ngo akomeze gutoza iyi kipe ariko nyuma uza gusubikwa kubera ikibazo cy’Imvura nyinshi yaguye ku Kicukiro akuzura ikibuga.
Gusa amakuru ari gucicikana hirya no hino avuga ko uyu mutoza Seninga ashobora gusimburwa na Karekezi Olivier watandukanye n’’ikipe ya Rayon Sport mu minsi ishize.
Seninga yatangiye gutoza Police FC muri Nyakanga 2016 aturutse muri Etincelles. Yari yarahawe amasezerano y’umwaka umwe, waje kongerwa.
TANGA IGITEKEREZO

Mu gihe i Bujumbura abatari bake mu batavuga rumwe n’Ubutegetsi bari mu Biganiro bibahuza n’Ubutegetsi, Alexis Sinduhije abicishije ku Mboneshakure y’abafaransa France 24 yamenyesheje ko umugambi uhari ari uwo gukura Pr. Petero Nkurunziza uko bigenda kwose.
Muri ico kiganiro yatanze yamenyesheje ko imirwano iriko iraba mu Burundi ari intango y’iyitari mike ishobora kuba mu gihe Pr. Petero Nkurunziza atorekura igihugu, akaba kandi yongeyeko ko nivyaba ngombwa ko batanga ubuzima bwabo buzotangwa kugira bakingire igihugu.
Yabajijwe ko yoba arikumwe n’Aba General bariko baratera i Burundi akaba yemeye yongerako ko ico atarico kibazo ahubwo ikibazo ari uko Nkurunziza yokinjura.

Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House inyubako iherereye mu karere ka Musanze mu murenge wa Nyange yatashywe ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 01/08/2019 n'abayobozi bakuru bari barangajwe imbere na Nyakubahwa Paul Kagame, Perezida w'u Rwanda.
Kuri uyu wa kane mu karere ka Musanze mu murenge wa Nyange habereye umuhango wo gutaha ku mugaragaro Hoteli yitwa Singita Kwitonda Lodge izajya itanga serivisi kuri ba mukerarugendo basura u Rwanda by'umwihariko abagana pariki y'igihugu y'ibirunga.
Perezida Paul Kagame mu ijambo rye yavuze ko kubaka iyi hoteli ari igikorwa gikomeye mu kurengera ibidukikije muri Afrika n'iterambere ry'urwego rwo kwakira abantu muri Afrika. Perezida Kagame ati “Iki ni igikorwa gikomeye ku kurengera ibidukikije muri Afurika n’iterambere ry’urwego rwo kwakira abantu kuri uyu mugabane.” Yunzemo ko u Rwanda rwiyemeje kuba ku isonga mu gutanga serivisi nziza.
Ni hotel yafunguwe na Perezida Paul KAGAME
Ni hoteli yitegeye ibirunga
Mu minsi micye imaze itangiye gukorera mu Rwanda, Hotel Singita Kwitonda imaze gutanga akazi ku banyarwanda babarirwa muri 70 biganjemo urubyiruko rukomoka mu miryango ituriye aho ikorera. Iyi hoteli yashowemo akayabo kangana na miliyoni 20 z'amadorali y'Amerika.
Src: RBA

Perezida wa Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa mbere yigereye ahabereye iri bara, binateganyijwe kandi ko aza gusura abarwayi bakomerekejwe n’ibisasu bari mu bitaro bitandukanye bya Kampala.

Maso agiye muri Gicumbi gusimbura Ruremesha Emmanuel wahoze ayitoza werekeje muri Etincelles.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE ku murongo wa telefoni, Maso yagize ati “Ni byo twamaze kumvikana, ariko sindasinya. Twaraganiriye, tureba ibibazo bihari n’inzira zo kubikemura.”
Abajijwe bimwe mu byo baganiriye byatumye afata icyemezo cyo kwerekeza muri Gicumbi, Maso yagize ati “Zimwe mu ngamba twavuze zirimo nko gukoresha abakinnyi bajyanye n’ubushobozi bw’ikipe, dushingiye ahanini ku bakomoka muri aka gace kugirango n’abaturage bayiyumvemo batange umusanzu wabo.”
Akomeza avuga ko intego ye nk’umutoza wa Gicumbi FC ari uguteza imbere umupira w’amaguru, kubaka ikipe ifite icyerekezo no kuyifasha kuguma mu cyiciro cya mbere.
Maso ahawe akazi muri Gicumbi FC nyuma y’ukwezi kumwe asezerewe muri Police FC yari amazemo imyaka ibiri yungirije umutoza Cassa Mbungo André nawe wirukanwe kubera umusaruro muke.
Uyu mutoza wanyuze mu makipe nka Musanze FC ategerejwe n’akazi gakomeye ko kongera kubaka Gicumbi FC yatakaje abakinnyi bayo bakomeye barimo rutahizamu Antoine Dominique werekeje muri Police FC, Rucogoza Aimable Mambo waguzwe na Bugesera FC ndetse na Nsengayire Shadad werekeje muri Etincelles.
Nshimiyimana Maurice 'Maso' agiye gutoza Gicumbi FC

Volleyball: RRA VC yitabiriye imikino y’Afurika mu Misiri
Yanditswe na admin
Ikipe RRA VC yitabiriye imikino y’Afurika y’amakipe yabaye aya mbere iwayo muri Volleyball y’abagore “2018 Women’s African Club Championship”, izabera i Cairo mu Misiri kuva tariki 5 kugeza 15 Werurwe 2018.
Iyi kipe igiye guhagararira igihugu muri iyi mikino ku nshuro ya 6 yahagurutse mu Rwanda ku wa Gatanu tariki 02 Werurwe 2018. Mbere yo guhaguruka, RRA VC yakoze umwiherero w’iyi mikino mu gihe kigera ku cyumweru kimw
... 
ko berekeza mu Misiri.
Ikipe ya RRA VC itaratangiye neza muri shampiyona y’uyu mwaka wa 2018, kuko iri ku mwanya wa 3 n’amanota 6 irushwa na APR VC ya mbere amanota 5, mbere y’uko ihaguruka yabanje gukina umukino wa gicuti n’ikipe y’igihugu y’abatarengeje imyaka 25 iyitsinda amaseti 3-1.
Mu mwaka ushize wa 2017, RRA VC itozwa na Masumbuko Jean de Dieu, yegukanye ibikombe birimo shampiyona, KAVC Memorial tournament, Kayumba Memorial tournament, Rutsindura Memorial inagera ku mukino wa nyuma w’iru
...
a 16 Mata 2017, ikipe ya CF de Carthage ni yo yegukanye igikombe itsinze El Shams ku mukino wa nyuma amaseti 3-2.
Abakinnyi 12 bitabiriye iyi mikino y’Afurika;
Mu bakinnyi 12 bazifashishwa muri iyi mikino y’Afurika y’uyu mwaka wa 2018 izitabirwa n’amakipe 22, ni Nyirimana Theodosia, Niyonkuru Adillah, Nyimukesha France, Akimanizanye Enestine, Nzayisenga Charlotte, Mutamba Oliver, Musaniwabo Hope, Uwamahoro Beatrice, Regina Izabayo, Mukantambara Seraphine, Hakizimana Judith na Umutesi Marie Paul.

Abagore bikingije COVID-19 batwite inda iri munsi y’amezi atatu barasaba RBC kubamara impungenge
Hari abagore batwite bavuga ko bakingiwe batwite bakiri mu gihembwe cya mbere ni ukuvuga ko bakingiwe inda itararenza amezi atatu none bakaba batewe impungenge n’urukingo bafashe nyamara amabwiriza ya OMS Umuryango mpuzamahanga wita ku buzima avuga ko ntaw’ukwiye kurufata inda irengeje amezi atatu.
Mukarulinda wo mu kagari ka Kagugu ubu afite inda y’amezi atanu avuga ko ubwo yakingirwaga COVID 19 mu 
... 
ara ngo nyuma y’ukwezi Kumwe yaje kujya kwa muganga abwirwa ko atwite inda y’amezi abiri.
Aba bose bavugako batewe impunge no kuba barikingije mbere inda zikiri ntoya kuko zitari zakarengeje amezi atatu, ateganywa n’ishami ry’Umuryango wabibumbye ryita kubuzima OMS .
Kuri Muhayimana we ngo afite impungenge z’ingaruka zagera ku mwana we ati “Njyewe urumva nakingiwe narasamye kandi inda yari itaragira amezi atatu mbanumva nzabyara umwana ufite ikibazo pee !muzambarize RBC niba ntangaruka bizangira
...
 twabamara impungenge ntabushakashatsi burakorwa ngo bwerekane ko umugore wakingiwe atararenza igihembwe cya mbere asamye urukingo rwa COVID 19 rwamugiraho ingaruka yaba we cyangwa uwo atwite, nibatuze rwose ikizwi ni uko iyo umugore utwite akingiwe bigabanya ibyago byo kuba yazahazwa ba Covid 19 .”
Mu kwezi kwa Karindwi uyu mwaka nibwo Leta y’u Rwanda binyuze mu kigo cy’ubuzima RBC yatangaje abagore batwite n’abonsa bakwiye gutangira kwikingiza Covid-19 kuko ari kimwe mu kiciro cyibasirwa nayo.

Kuri uno wa kabiri igenekerezo rya 17 ruhuhuma umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu Edouard NDUWIMANA yuguruye ibikorwa vyo gusasa amabuye ku mabarabara ya avenue de la Mission na avenue de l’amitié mugushirako ibuye ryambere.
Umukuru w’igisagara amaze gutanga ikaze abaserukiye PNUD, CTB hamwe n’umushikiranganji bafashe amajambo aho bagiye baragaruka ku kamaro k’amabarabara ashashwe amabuye. Umushikiranganji Edouard NDUWIMANA akaba yashimiye abafashije kugira ico gikorwa girangurwe mu gihe muvyo bari bemereye abakoresha ayo mabarabara ko bagiye kuyakora, akamenyesha ko ayo mabarabara azofasha mw’iterambere ry’abakozi bariko barayakorerako aho ivyo bikorwa bizomara amezi ane arenga.
Uwaserukiye CTB akaba yashimye akigoro kakozwe n’ishirahamwe SETEMU rifise uburambe mu kwubaka amabarabara ashashwemwo amabuye, akamenyeshako hambavu y’uko abakozi bayakora bazohembwa amafaranga bazoshobora kwifashisha mu kwiteza imbere bazonaharonkera inyigisho zitandukanye; Kugwanya ikiza ruhonyanganda SIDA, kubungabunga amabarabara, inyigisho zo gukunda igihugu no gukora imigambi mbere bakazoshobora no kuzoshinga imigambi azobakura mu bukene.
Ico mwomenya n’uko ayo mabarabara azoba afise amatara yakishwa umuyagankuba, utuyira tw’abagenda n’amaguru n’aho bahagarika amamodokari kandi ko abakozi baronse akazi bashika ijana na mirongo itanu aho abapfasoni n’abigeme bashika mirongo irindwi.

Ejo ku musi wa mbere itariki 20 Munyonyo 2017, hari haramutswe hakorwa Inama ku Burundi mu Nama y’Umutekano ya ONU aho intumwa idasanzwe ya ONU Ku Burundi, Michel Kafando, yari aramutse agira ico ashikiriza mu Nama Y’umutekano ya ONU ku Burundi. Yamenyesheje ko naho hari intamabamyi ku bijanye n’ibiganiro bidakumira mu Burundi, ishirahamwe Mpuzamkungu ONU rikwiye kubandanya rifasha mu Burundi mu bijanye na Politike.
Michel Kafando yamenyesheje Inama y’umutekano igizwe nibihugu 15 kw’isi ati: “ I
... 
b’Uburundi, abatavuga rumwe na Leta bari mu gihgu canke bari mu Bubiligi, harimwo abafasha mu biganiro bihuza Abarundi nka Yoweli Kaguta Museveni wa Uganda.
Nkuko urubuga rwa ONU rubimenyesha, umuhuza ari kumwe n’umufasha mu biganiro bihuza Abarundi, Benjamin Mkapa, kumwe na leta y’Uburundi bumvikanye kugira ibiyago hagati ya Leta y’uburundi n’abegwa bose n’ikibazo c’Uburundi, harimwo n’abatavuga rumwe bari mu buhungiro guhera ku musi wa mbere w’indwi dutangura itariki 27 Munyonyo 2017.
Michel K
...
eguye”. Akaba kandi yamenyesheje ko “Leta y’Uburundi ibandandanya yitegurira amatora ya 2020 kandi ikibazo c’ibiganiro bidakumira kitarava mu nzira”.
Ivyo biri uko mu gihe ibiro vya HCR hamwe na OCHA( Office for The Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs) vyamenyesheje ko abantu bashika imiliyoni 6 mu Burundi bakeneye imfashanyo yihuta, mu gihe mu gutorera umuti ico kibazo hari gusa ica kabiri c’ibikenewe gufashisha. Ikibazo c’impunzi naco kiraraje ishinga cane ku buryo citabwaho ku bice 19% gusa.
